12122132.content:
Your body slams into the fabric and your fists curl in between the threads of the girls sock above her pinky toe! Scrambling like an petrified animal, you quickly crawl further up her foot, just in time to avoid the hungry gecko's bite as it lunged its head at you, mouth wide open and its fringed foot already placed upon her toe as it continued the pursuit.

The gecko took another step up, placing its other front leg further ahead of its opposite. This however, did not fill you with fear or dread, but a sense of accomplishment! This girl was bound to feel this little lizard down here and take action. You give the gecko a victorious smile once you hear a surprised gasp from above and a twitch from the surface you stood upon.

"Um, hey Taylor. Looks like Remi got out again."

... Remi? You couldn't imagine such a cute name belonging to such a monstrous creature, but hey, if you had your usual perspective you would probably find this gecko to be much more charming than you do now.

You hear Taylor groan. "Abby must have left his cage open again. That kid can be so stupid sometimes I swear to god. Somebody's going to end up stepping on him one of these days."

"Awww, dont even say that!", the polynesian girl cooed. "He's so cute! He came right up to you Sophia."

Well that was that little 'mystery' solved. This blonde girl was Sophia so that meant the other girl was Laura. It was nice to put a name to the one who ultimately saved you, even if it was nothing more to her than pointing out a harmless little gecko. You watch with ultimate relief as Taylor scoops Remi into her hand, unaware to the little man also on her friends foot, and watch him rise up as Taylor stands tall. She holds him in the palm of her hand and you watch with a hint of jealousy as each girl takes turns stroking the little monsters back with their index fingers and giving him butterfly kisses. You were so distracted by the coddling that you didn't fully register that Sophia and Laura each held a sandwich in their hand. Unbeknownst to you, the girls had already packed away the ingredients as you were being chased and were about to head out back to school for 3rd period, with the two girls choosing to bring their lunch on the go since the bell would be ringing soon. This becomes evident to you when Taylor addresses her friends.

"Im going to put this little guy back in his cage then we'll head back."

"Sure. We'll wait for you outside. Bye Remi!", Laura said with a cheerful smile.

With that, the foot you clung to suddenly lifted off the ground in a pivoting step, and began to rise into the air and slam into the ground in a rhythmic pattern, as Sophia and Laura walked to the front door! You had dropped to your belly and held tight to avoid falling off and injuring yourself! This was not good! The size device was being left behind! You twisted your body and looked back past Sophia's ankle as you were brought out of the kitchen and soon found yourself in the front entrance in matter of seconds! Already, Sophia had crossed a distance that would take you at least a hour to travel, and without warning she lifted her foot over top her sneaker and began to slip it and you inside! You could feel the heat of her shoe already, before even passing the tongue of the footwear. It was filled with a sick humid air. The sneaker was a gateway to a whole new world of Sophia's feet. The surface of her sock was nothing compared to these stench ridden shoes! In fact, the air around her sock smelled somewhat pleasant, she obviously believed in good hygiene, though evidently she could care less about shoe freshening. The air itself was becoming heavy. When her foot finally got slid into the shoe, you were now by surrounded the dense air. It burned your nose and made your eyes water. The worst part was you could smell a hint of Sophia's well kept foot beneath the fabric of the sock, which acted as your unobtainable light at the end of the tunnel, which would no doubt soon conform with the rest of the stench once she began moving.

Finally, her foot came to a rest inside the shoe, and remained still as he did the same with her other foot. The roof of the shoe was so low you couldn't stand up, so you began to crawl desperately in the direction you believed to be the shoe collar, but it was literally a shot in the dark since you were so deep inside and enveloped by blackness. You could only base your heading on the fact that when you entered the shoe, you were facing straight down her toe, so if you turned in a complete 180, you should be making your way to the exit. As you crawl, you feel a release of pressure and weightlessness before a sudden impact rocks your body to its core! Sophia must have started walking! These events continued in a pattern as her and Laura walked out onto Taylor's porch. Your head was swimming, and for a second you felt you had lost your sense of direction as your vision rolled from side to side before finally steadying again. After a minute of crawling you reached a point that revealed to you the sunlight seeping into the shoe. You were close! As quick as you could you hightailed it to the shoe collar and finally breached out of the suffocating foot stench and sucked in the glory of fresh air as your upper body slumped over the collar.

It was like heaven to feel this relief, your chest heaved in and out as you savored the clean air and gazed down the side of the shoe wall. It was a far drop to the stone floor of the porch, so you would need to try and climb down then find a way back to the device in the kitchen. Just as you were about to hoist the rest of your body out from the shoe, you hear the front door open and watch as Taylor walks out and joins her friends. Before you knew it, they were all back to walking so you had no choice but to hang on tight and ride it out. You watched the house slowly shrink out of view as the girls walked further and further and you couldn't believe how crap your luck was. Sophia may have saved you from the gecko but now she was taking you away from the house and the shrink device. You could only hope Sophia and Taylor had class together so you could stow away on her and have her be your ride back to her house.

The girls arrived and you were taken aback by the impossibly massive scale of the three story high school. You thought the girls were mountain sized? They were like Hollywood hill compared to Mount Everest! The three of them entered the school and you were once again filled with dread to hear Taylor say her goodbyes as she headed off to her next class and disappeared down the crowded hallway. You slammed your fist in anger against Sophia's shoe. Yet another setback!

As far as you could see, you had two options, stay with Sophia and probably end up going with her back to her house, or get off her foot and wander these gigantic halls in a blind search for Taylor.
12122132.title: Sophia's sock

choices: Sophia playfully removes her shoe with her other foot
You see a boy is staring at you
Fast forward to Sophia going home
121221322.content:
You were left with no real option other than this one. Taylor was nowhere to be found and you certainly didnt want to end up spending the night in this place should you never find her. With no options for food, a janitor, and miles upon miles of vast open floor, ... that was out of the question.

Sophia was moving down the hall with Laura to their next class together. Spanish, from what you overheard. The two of them walked for a few minutes until they entered their classroom. There they were greeted by a group of their friends, all in seats near the back of the classroom. The two girls took their spots with them and without missing a beat, joined in on their loud conversation.

Meanwhile, you had to just put up with hanging around on Sophia's foot for a few hours. Clinging halfway on the collar of the shoe was making your arms hurt, so you decide to cross over onto the top of the shoes tongue to atleast sit. It was soft enough that you could get a grip on should Sophia get fidgety. All that was left to do now, was wait for school to end... damn... it was gonna be a long day.
121221322.title: Patience is key

choices: The Newhooks are your new home
Stick to your first choice; get back to Taylor
1212213223.content:
The day went by as slowly as one could expect when you're stuck sitting in a single spot for hours on end. Your ass was dead by the time the final bell rung, and you were hungrier than you had been in a long while now, so the sooner Sophia would move it and get back home the sooner you could finally get off her damn foot and find a bite to eat.

How the hell did it come to this? You planned for things to go wrong but this was just... infuriating! One setback after another. You wouldn't be surprised if you managed to get back to your neighbours house only to find the size device missing, not at all. If that happened, you figured you would probably just stand in a giants path and let them flatten you're miserable little body into blood soup.

With a sigh, you stand up and jog down the length of the shoe until you reach the crossed laces. You sit down on your butt and lift up a lace that was just as wide as you and slither your lower body underneath it to keep you secure as you knew Sophia would start walking once again to exit the school.

The oblivious blonde stood up from her desk and began packing her things in her book bag. One of her friends who wasnt Laura, was talking her ear off while Sophia multitasked and did her best to follow this girls story. From her body language, even you could tell from down here that Sophia just wanted to pack up and head home, but just didnt want to be rude. The girl followed Sophia out the classroom and down the hall before finally fucking off and giving you a much needed break from her droning voice. However it wasnt long before she was replaced by yet another friend of Sophia's in the forms of a girl and a boy this time. Oh great, just what the doctor ordered. The chattermouth appetizer followed by a double dose of silence deniers! It was getting to you. You were never particularly a people person. Often finding yourself bored of a conversation after half a minute, but now those voices werent so easy to tune out since that they were amplified to your puny ears.

The three of them walked to the back of the school and stood aways into the parking lot, along with many other small crowds of students. Your guess was, these were all bus riders waiting for their assigned transportation. Which meant more waiting for you. You had hoped Sophia's mom or whoever would just be outside waiting for her... but no such luck.

You puff air from your chest and rest your heavy head against the surface of the lace above you, staring straight up into the sky... or in your case, the sky and Sophia's nostrils. God, these people were living skyscrapers.

You lay there on the shoe, for a solid fifteen minutes. Listening to Sophia and the girl speak about their things, the boy jumping in obnoxiously with a joke, a poor attempt at impressing them but they allow him a half assed giggle anyways. Finally, the buses pool into the lot and Sophia walks on amd takes a seat near the back with her female friend. Once again, another good amount of time goes by. Slowly but surely, the bus makes progress, dropping Sophia's friend off and the rest of the students one by one. You couldnt see outside the window, but you hazarded a guess that the bus would be near outside of town at this point.

Your suspicion is confirmed when the bus stops for Sophia and she walks off with a pleasant "thank you" to the bus driver. The mailbox towered with the word 'NEWHOOK', painted on its side. It seemed you were about to be an uninvited guest of the Newhook family. She lived in a rural area outside of town. Not secluded, but enough property to keep her neighbours a good distance away. You knew this house. It was one of the few in this area that had a stable for horses!

Goddamit! Did she take you to a place infested with animals!? You didnt know a single family in all your years on this earth that owned horses and not at least a couple cats or dogs. How much worse could things get!?

You have all these maddening thoughts as Sophia walked down her dirt driveway towards her two story house. It was a cute little home. Not too flashy. Humble would be a word to describe it, and the inside fit that bill as well.

The front porch had only a two step staircase before you could reach the door. On it were a couple of lawn chairs and small potted flowers on either side of the door. Once inside, you took in the entryway. A straight staircase was just ahead that led to the upper floor made of red oak. It seemed that (minus the living room) most the floor was made up of red oak floor boards. The living room was to the right of the landing. The floor there was made of carpet you recognized as the 'spring cheviot' variety... you wanted the same kind for your ugly apartment.
All in all, this was a charming little place; simple and ornamental at the same time.

Before you finished getting a layout of the place, Sophia had finally; much to your relief, removed the shoe you were strapped in from her foot. You gave an exhausted cheer, and waited for her to leave down the hallway before making a move off. As you climbed down the shoe, you heard Sophia greeting her mother off in the direction you last saw her. The two began chatting about their days which served you just fine, as you now had a location where two giants were accounted for... but who knew how large this girls family was. Best to keep your eyes and ears open.

When you finally break contact with the material of the shoe and stand upon actaul solid ground, you couldnt help but crack a smile. It felt so good to be able to rely upon the floor you stood on to not rise and move without warning. You walk away from the shoe and head off towards the living room, keeping your senses alert for any curious pet that wanted to check you out. So far so good, as you entered the carpeted floor of the living room with strands that reached up to your chest.

Your goal was to find a spot to hunker down for the night. Not to far from the exit as you wanted to hitch a ride on Sophia back to school so you could find Taylor.
You continued on your trek through the living room, just getting past the leg of the couch, when you suddenly stop in your tracks! On the other side of the couch, resting on its own dog bed, was a gigantic samoyed dog, nose in the air, sniffing for that unfamiliar scent which was undoubtedly yourself. You watched in horror as the dog turned its head towards you, peeking at you from behind the corner of the couch. It saw you! You froze in anticipation of its next move... when you started to notice, this dog didnt look that young. Its black nose look weathered, its fur shaggy instead of necessarily fluffy, and its eyes lazy. This was an old boy. An old boy that was apparently entirely disinterested in you, as you watched it slump its head back into its bed.

You were astounded! This was a stroke of luck you didn't believe could happen anymore! A quick jog to the center of the living room gave you a view into the kitchen, where you saw a single large bag of senior dog chow resting on the floor next to a food and water dish. From the evidence you gathered, you were pretty positive this was the only household animal this family owned. A sweet old, tired, lazy pooch that you doubted would chase down a mouse even if you dipped it in steak sauce. This place was starting to look pretty good to you if you were being honest.
1212213223.title: The Sophia Residence

choices: Explore the living room
See what Sophie and Mrs Newhook are up to
Gather food from the kitchen
Try to get upstairs
Tame the doggie monster
12122132231.content:
Well, there's a big ol' dog that's going to ignore you, and two giant women. The other members of the family may or may not be home at the moment, so where you choose to head may have an element of luck to it.

You could look around the living room you're in to find somewhere to set up a base, head to see what the two giants are up to, go to the kitchen to get some food from the doggie chow, try to get upstairs, or go and see if you can tame the dog, get it carry you places like in that movie you saw that one time...
12122132231.title: The Newhooks

choices: Run past Taylor, toward the refridgerator
Run past Brian, toward the entrance
Climb onto Taylor's shoe
Climb onto Brian's shoe
Stay exactly where you are
12123.content:
You don't have to wait long for the second giant to show themselves: dirty white trainers stomp along in Taylor's wake, legs sheathed in vertically-striped tracksuit bottoms. You guess at 'male' even before Taylor addresses the newcomer, turning in place with shockwaves that once again blast you away.

"Ha! I win, Brian! Loser!"

Brian himself stomps to a finish distant from Taylor - probably quite close to the two of them, though - and his own footfalls bat you back toward Taylor! "Yeah, well, you cheated! What's the point of this, anyway? If you wanted to talk, we coulda done that over Skype, without all this running around!" You can practically hear the pout on his face, even if you can't physically see beyond his knee.

Taylor steps closer to her boyfriend, and you cower between these two giants. "Brian, my parents aren't home. You know what that means?"

"Huh? Oh. Ohhhhh."

Well, you worked it out before Brian. Great catch there, Taylor. Great catch. Maybe they're kissing up there, since they've stopping both talking and walking. This could be your chance to get away, while the ground is undisturbed by their quaking footsteps. But could you get far enough before they started moving again, possibly stomping you? You could try grabbing hold of one of these giants, and allow them to transport you from here at a far more rapid rate, so long as you jump off before they reach their destination...
12123.title: Blessed by Brian's Presence

choices: Get out of the kitchen while Abby and her lizards are here.
Hang around near Abby, hoping to snag some scraps.
Retreat back to your camp to hide until she goes away.
Head to the machine to re-size
Leave the kitchen and explore the house
1213.content:
Yeah, that's Abby, the fifteen year-old. You can only see as far as her knees in those jeans, but those garish shoes would only be worn by someone of that age; Taylor would be into something much more mature.

Those massive shoes stomp across the kitchen floor toward the fridge, and above those impacts you can hear her talking. On her phone, you presume?

"What should we eat, guys? Let's see what we have..."

So, she and her friends are going out somewhere later? But then, it sounds like she's about to open the fridge? Either way, you scuttle a bit closer to her, to see if she may drop some previous food that could work as supplies for you. There is a great *thump* as the door of the fridge is wrenched open with casual ease by the giantess, and she speaks again.

"Whoops!"

There is an impact as something crashes to the floor ahead of you, and you instinctively flinch. It's a large, clear plastic container. Perhaps it's a tupperware tub? But then you see what it contained, as the dragons crawl forth from within.

Scaled, clawed feet clack against the tile as the beasts slowly pull themselves out to survey the area, long tongues crawling from snouts to taste the air. To tiny you, the pair are monsters from legend, reptiles that dwarf elephants. To mighty Abby, the geckos are cute, handheld pets. Perfect. Here you were, confident that fur allergies would keep this house clear of animals that might eat you, and now this girl has brought a pair of miniature Godzillas to gobble you up!

They haven't spotted you yet, and Abby is already stooping to scoop them up again in her humungous hands, but the look in those placid eyes chills you to the bone. Maybe you should make yourself scarce while those creatures are present, and search some other part of the house? But Abby is going to feed them something, so if you stick around at her feet there's a good chance of scavving some scraps from her obvious clumsiness...
1213.title: No Pets, Huh?

choices: ...back to camp, where it's safe.
...towards Abby, where there's food.
...out of the room, to explore more.
...up, climbing the fridge
...away, across the kitchen floor to another spot
12133.content:
Nope nope nope nope nope. You decided to camp inside to stay away from hungry animals, not to get closer to them. You scuttle back to your camp and throw yourself into your tent, safe (or at least safer) from the hungry beasts.

"Sorry about that. How about we get you some pears, huh? Will that make up for it?" She stomps around for a while more, but you're done with her for now. Eventually, her footsteps fade away, and you feel confident enough to venture back out.

You were right about one thing: Abby was a mess maker. A sliver of pear, cut to the right size for the geckos, was sitting on the floor before the fridge, dropped and unnoticed by the teen. Unfortunately, it was trampled completely flat and caked with dirt from her shoe.

You make a mental note (Abby doesn't watch where she walks) and head over to the scrap to see if there's anything you can salvage. Most of it was ruined beyond what you were willing to eat, but you were able to gather at least enough for a single, small meal. Anything to keep your rations going longer. You take it back to camp and eat it then, worried it'll spoil even faster after being trod on.

You're washing the last pear down when you hear footsteps again. It's Abby again, her gaudy shoes sparkling as she steps towards the fridge.

"Alrighty," she says to herself. "Now that I've got my girls fed, what about me? Hmmm..."

Filing another mental note (Abby talks to herself a lot), you realize that this could be the chance you were waiting for earlier. She's messy, so she'll probably drop some food for you to store in your little cubby camp.

She rocks back on her heels, and you catch a glimpse of bits of pear stuck between the treads. It also might be wiser to stay away from this girl, at least while she's stomping around in those thick soled shoes. And anyway, you did just eat.

Deciding, you stand up straight and march...
12133.title: Herpetophobia

choices: Stay and take food as it falls
Run to table to wait for food at eating time
Climb the shoe while it is still
Hide under the fridge until she goes away
Leave the kitchen and go to another room
121332.content:
Yes, you have just eaten, but that was pear mush from underneath some teenage girl's shoe. You are fed for today, but you need to gather supplies for the future, and with Abby alone in the kitchen you will have the best access to the family's stores.

The feet, encased in those ugly, ugly shoes, rock back and forth as she hums to herself, browsing through who knows what variety of food within the cupboards of the gods. There's no need to go near them, those giant feet. No, you can hug the skirting board and dash out to snatch scraps before they get crushed.

Or... You can run past the girl, to that small kitchen table. While she may drop some scraps while taking the food out, isn't she more likely to do so while sitting down to eat? Sure, you have to brave a run through the open, but she's fully occupied at present...

Since she is fully occupied, you could risk the dangers of her immensity to climb her shoe. Then, you'll be placed perfectly to go with her, and reap any scraps that she splatters there.
121332.title: Feed Me!

choices: Leave the room as fast as possible, via the open door
Hide in the shoe - she's unlikely to put them on again soon
Approach Abby for another chance at food
Explore the room
See what resources you can strip from the shoe
1213323.content:
In your new life of tiny survival, you're going to have to get used to people being this big. You can't keep away from them forever. Oh, you totally need to respect their power and keep your distance, but this is a good opportunity to test your limits. Also, in your surveillance of this area, you concentrated mainly on Taylor and her parents; it would pay off well to get an idea of Abby's daily routine and personality.

So you stumble up to the base of Abby's shoe, gazing up the intimidating height just up to the top of her foot. You always knew that your new life would involve some climbing, and so invested time in some rock-climbing lessons before you shrank yourself today.

Even with that, it is a trial to drag yourself up this gaudy mountain, digging hand and sword into tiny holes that exist at your scale. Abby's every minor movement throws you about, but as one of her dangling laces swings by, you take a risk by jumping for it. The softer surface allows you to progress upwards far faster, but then Abby begins to walk.

She strides along, each impact of her foot tossing her lace hither and thither, your insectile form along for the ride and tested to its very limit. As your fingers begin to strain, the weight of your body and the goddess' motions tearing at them, the movement ceases.

The lace slams back against the side of the shoe, your body bruised along with it. Maybe this was a bad idea?

Wearily, you cast your eyes around, but then Abby takes off her shoes.

Rather than untie them, she jams the toe-end of one against the heel of the other and pops her foot free, sending the shoe flying. You are on the first removed piece of footwear, which explodes across the room like a crashing aeroplane. Giddily, you stagger forth and involuntarily duck as the second shoe soars overhead, crashing into the wall.

Abby stands tall before you, the previous few seconds of Hell that you experienced nothing memorable at all to her. You can't even move, simply watching as her socked feet stomp again once or twice, before rising to allow her to sit cross-legged on her bed.

Yes, on her bed - she's brought you to her bedroom. At extreme distances you can make out the geography of her sleeping place, Your body is battered and in need of healing, though, so remaining here will be an extreme risk.

Such is the scale of this place, you can barely make out the shapes of the mountains so distant, and Abby's discarded shoe beside you takes on a newfound relevance. It dominates your immediate vicinity, the cavernous interior rearing above you like a cave for the gods to live in, yet that dark hole is only big enough to squeeze the ankle of a teenage girl. And the stench of her sweat emanates from within to remind you of that.

Still, this glitzy monument to 'fashion' could prove useful - you could tear from it plenty of useful building materials!
1213323.title: The New Order of Things

choices: Try to find a file to sharpen your blade on
Head to the kitchen, defenceless
Put up a hut in Abby's room
Explore Abby's room
Take even more from Abby's shoe
12133235.content:
You're here to survive. You need resources to do that. The tough material of a shoe will be perfect for constructing a small shelter for yourself, rugged and long-lasting. So, with trusty blade in hand, you close on the immense structure and set to cutting.

It takes a lot of effort to break through the first layer, sawing back and forth, all your strength exerted in minutes.

Strips tear off, yes, but it takes so much out of you that you sink down, out of breath to recover. Abby remains oblivious, doing whatever she's doing all the way beyond the limits of your vision. Thus you cast aside the screams of your muscles, never stopping as you cut back and forth, and in time have accrued a substantial stash of thick, leather-ish material to construct your shelter.

The mound is huge, one that you're proud of having gathered, but could still be covered entirely by Abby's toe. She could smash all your effort underfoot without even noticing. You have to keep everything in perspective.

Slumping down to rest, you examine your blade. It's dulled considerably, likely not much use in the future until you can sharpen it. That sucks. Abby must have a nail file around here somewhere that you could use to sharpen it, but do you want to go to that effort right now?

You could haul your spoils back to the kitchen, but do you want to travel without an effective weapon to defend yourself?

Maybe you should construct a temporary shelter in this room, rest there and then head out to find the file later?

But is your blade even worth repairing? There must be other things that could cut in this room, just waiting for you to take them!

Lastly, you could keep using this blade up until the very end, cutting until it breaks; there's still more on this shoe to take - maybe a few strands of the lace, a sheet made from the size label or many other things - strip it bare while you have this chance that may not come up again!
12133235.title: The Old Lady Who Lived In a Shoe

choices: Poke around the beauty products
Check out the clothing mound
Climb into the drinks can
Search the snack food packet
Venture into the unknown beneath the bed
121332354.content:
Stooping, you gather some of Abby's discarded hairs from the carpet. They make for a thick rope to someone of your scale, and tying them together you construct a rough harness, allowing you to drag the heap of building material behind you.

Your progress is slow, with that immense weight at your back, but the room around you is too big for you to fully traverse quickly anyway. A steady gait gives you time to look around, see what opportunities for further gathering abound.

Off to your left, in the shadow of a skyscraper dresser, a heap of beauty products have either fallen, or been carelessly dropped. Powders, varnishes and other chemical agents are plentiful, along with applicators. There may be some creative uses you could put such supplies to.

To the right, a good distance shy of the laundry basket they may be intended for, a mountain of used clothing lies. Within there there should be plenty of material for making warm weather clothing, or even further construction.

Ahead, directly beneath the edge of the bed where the girl sits, a soft drink can sits on its side, a yawning black cave where its ring-pull has been torn at the very bottom, inviting for the possibility of some sweet liquid within.

Closer to the near-closed door to this room is a shiny metallic wrapper, a nearly-empty packet of crisps that has been discarded. You can still smell strong flavour, so there must be some crumbs left within.

Beneath the bed itself is utter darkness - there may be an unknown bounty beneath there, underneath the goddess herself without her knowledge...
121332354.title: A Vast Field of Bounty

choices: Go back for your materials
Hide by the can
Scamper under the bed to hide
Run toward the room exit, past Abby
Climb the wall, to get away from those deadly feet
1213323543.content:
The cave-like entrance to the can isn't too far from the ground, and you scramble up easily enough, minding the drop to the interior floor.

Your feet sink into thick liquid with a splash, and you stoop to scoop up and taste a handful - very sweet. Whether it is flat or not is beyond someone of your stature - the bubbles would be too big for you to swallow anyway!

Standing again, you look around. With light only coming from the small opening at your back, much of this metallic cavern is pitch black. Giving a shout, the echo from all around you speaks to the massive space within here, almost a barrel cathedral. Quite something, but nothing to stick around for. You should drink your fill, maybe take a little drink for later - the sugar rush will be useful for quick bursts of energy.

Your shout has barely faded before a louder sound crunches into your world, the distant ceiling of the can bending inward with a wrenching, agonising screech - knocking you to the floor, splashing full-length in the liquid goo.

Spluttering, you push yourself up, wondering what the Hell happened there. Then the world erupts, the lake beneath you floating into the air as gravity ceases to have meaning. You tumble within the cylinder, battered by both the drink and the walls, the dazzling view of the outside world whirling into incomprehension.

Everything crashes down, and you gasp as you pull yourself toward the light, desperate to get out of here, find out what's going on, continue to SURVIVE -

You drop out onto the carpet, quite some distance from where you entered. The can has moved, your bundled shoe material not here. The can rests against a wall, and you back away to notice that it's perfect shape has been damaged, dented and deformed from above as if from the blow of an angry god, strong enough to smash such a steadfast steel structure.

Turning away, you can see your resources some distance away, across the carpet, dwarfed by Abby's socked left foot. Your estimation earlier was right: the whole mass of heavy material is nothing before even her toe.

Following her leg upward, you see that she is cradling her bare right foot before her, rubbing it as if to soothe a pain. "Stupid can!" she mutters, even that under-the-breath utterance a great thunder from above. Huh. Looks like you were also correct when you thought "Abby doesn't watch where she walks". She must have stepped down from sitting on the bed, effortlessly crushing the can beneath her foot before she felt it possibly cut her, and then she kicked it away.

To you, it was an apocalypse, yet she won't give it another thought.

The giant sits there on her bed, and she's probably going to stand up soon. What should you do now? You left the scavenged shoe material over there, but she's standing right next to it - dare you go to retrieve it?
1213323543.title: Can Crusher

choices: Head under the bed to build a shelter
Take some food from the open crisp packet
Get some thread from the empty sock
Try to climb up off this deadly floor area
Leave the bedroom and head elsewhere
12133235431.content:
You spent effort gathering those materials. To abandon them now would be to make a waste of the time, and in a world of tiny survival every moment, every breath, must count toward furthering your future.

Sights locked on your stash, in the shadow of that immense, socked foot, you stride forward across the bedroom carpet. Every step makes Abby even bigger, filling your view more and more as your speck-like self closes on her. That foot remains steady as the hill it so resembles, and you are soon within yards of your goal, breathing relief.

Then Abby's bare right foot smashes down between you and your stuff, balancing on its ball and toes. You look up a the flashy wall helplessly, in thrall as a god-voice speaks from above.

"I'd better get a plaster."

Abby walks out of the room, limping to favour her socked foot. Each of her steps trembles the ground less than it had before, as she takes time and care, yet still she crosses vast distances in seconds. Soon, she's gone as if she were never here, leaving your salvaged shoe scraps next to her bed with her discarded sock.

As you re-gather your materials, you reflect on how much more useful it would be to be around a giant that announced loudly what she was going to do, compared to the surprises a silent monster could kill you with. Perhaps it might be useful to stay in this room after all?

There are more opportunities here. You've had the drink, but the packet of crisps still lies nearby, and that smelly, empty sock could be stripped for useful threads. You have some time before Abby returns, after all, but not enough to do all these things.
12133235431.title: No Wasted Time

choices: Jump off the lip to ANYWHERE ELSE
Begin climbing down the chin
Attack the lip to agitate it
Work your way sideways, across the cheek
Stay where you are, hope Abby does not notice you
121332354312.content:
The cheesy-smelling crisps inside that cavernous packet may be little more than junk food, but as a tiny survivalist you can't afford to overlook any source of nutrition! Sliding your building materials under the bed's overhang, you approach the gigantic bag that a regular person could comfortably hold in one hand.

Within, great orbs of compacted corn are arrayed, smothered in a dusting of cheese flavouring whose particles are almost as big as your fist! Picking one up and biting into it, it is almost overwhelming in intensity. With you blade you begin scraping at the hard shell of a snack itself, since some corn could be a helpful, filling ingredient in many a future meal.

No sooner have you carved off a long stretch of food than the ground quivers and quakes before the terrible approach of the giantess. You make for the exit, but of course you're too slow, your little legs no match for those of a regular human.

Like the can before it, the bag is subjected to the full weight of Abby's heel. Unlike that metal construction, it provides no resistance, and the entirety of your shelter is flattened beneath her tread. All goes black, and with sickening crunching noises each of the massive snacks is reduced to powder. You hold your hands above your head as you are pelted with and buried in both cheese and corn, thankfully too small to be flattened yourself.

The invader is gone the instant after her attack, and you shake your head free of particles as her footsteps recede. Yes, Abby does not watch where she walks. You're really going to learn that lesson one day soon!

"Oops," her voice resounds from above. "Well, better not waste them."

What? But before you can act, the whole bag is lifted into the air, opening angling toward the ceiling and sending you tumbling into a ballpit of unhealthy dust, struggling to fight to the surface, to get to air, to not be buried -

As you head breaks the surface, you look directly up to see Abby's great eye peering into the bag. Small as you are, she'll never spot you, but you don't like where this is heading. Shortly, the bag tilts again, almost entirely inverting, and you're sliding down its inside aloing with all the other detritus, toward the gaping mouth that now sits at the terminus.

You claw desperately at something, anything, to get a grip and halt your descent, but the bag is too smooth, and you are being smacked by other items all too eager to be eaten. Countless crumbs tumble down onto her tongue, and another lesson of tiny survival rears up in these, your last moments: any food found near a giant is at great risk of being eaten by said giant.

As you finally leave the safety of the bag, cartwheeling through space, you hear the satisfying smack of lips pressing together, Abby closing her mouth. Thus, instead of her throat, you land on her lower lip, and grab onto it for dear life.

It may seem that you're saved, but this is probably just a stay of execution. If Abby is like any other human alive, she'll shortly be licking these very same lips to pick up any stray particles. So just what do you do?
121332354312.title: Snack Food

choices: Shrink now!  No cheating!
