So, now that you're well-rested and have a supply of rope, you could climb atop this gentleman and grab a supply of food while he feasts. This behemoth can spare a few crumbs for someone as tiny as you!

Alternatively, you could take advantage of the time the family will spend around the dinner table to go off elsewhere to gather supplies or knowledge of the landscape. Thus prepared, you'll be better off.

A third choice? Sticking on this chair back has worked out pretty well so far; you could stay here some more and watch what else may happen, as the other two choices do contain a measure of risk...
1321212112113233.title: D1:  Man of the House

choices: Make it, and jump off the stroller.
Don't make it, and end up under the child.
Are stopped by the oman's leg again
132121212.content:
As the mother finishes cleaning her child, you finish your makeshift parachute. It's not pretty, but it's sturdy enough, and you've no desire to stay on the station when it's closed back up. As the toddler behind you gurgles happily, you jump.

It works beautifully. Softly you float downwards, like a mote of dust or a graceful bird or a descending parachutist. You smile at your ingenuity, proud of your ability to escape even the most dangerous of situations. Everything was going right.

Suddenly everything went wrong. The massive mother shifted slightly as she lifted her daughter. To her, it was just a few inches. To you, she moved the length of a football field. The side of her thigh slammed into you, a thick denim wall that shattered your hold on the parachute and sent you tumbling out of control. As your paper fluttered away in the breeze, you hurdled downwards.

You gracefully crash into a plain of pink polyester: the stroller seat. "Lucky me," you mutter to yourself, knowing full well that this was anything but. Sure, it broke your fall, but at what cost.

The artificial light far above is eclipsed by the mother holding her child. The child with the fresh diaper. The child who would be sitting in the stroller. The stroller you were currently on.

With a yell, you charge for the edge of the seat. It was a bit of a drop, but you did not come all this way to be smothered under a baby. The mother, far above but getting closer, is bringing the child down. You have seconds. With a final burst of energy, you...
132121212.title: Falling to adapt

choices: Jump from a moving vehicle to go back and get your water!
Ride along until motion ceases and you can disembark safely
Climb higher on this mobile fortress for a view of the land
1321212122.content:
I just wanted a drink of water, you lament, as the immense infant descends.

You are fast enough to avoid being crushed utterly beneath that clean-diapered ass, but progress up the slope of the polyester plain is slow, and a weight of flesh smacks into your back.

The colossal thigh of this kid doesn't bring its full force down upon you, but it does form your ceiling as you roll onto your back, checking for injuries. Nothing broken, thank God.

"All clean," a woman's voice smiles. "That's better, isn't it?"

Raising your head, you can only make out vague details of the massive mother as she neatly straps her child into place.

"Now, shall we go back out into the sunlight?"

No, damn it, I only just got here! Careful not to disturb the warm expanse of skin above you for fear of encouraging the kid to investigate, you crawl from under its shadow. Beyond the length of the leg, which sharply bends down below the seat's horizon, you can make out the denim wall that the giant woman's shins form, shadows moving across them as she stands to her full height.

"Maybe the park? Would you like that?"

No, no I wouldn't! You drag yourself forward, moving as fast as you can through the valley of this girl's legs, beneath the shadow of her skirt, but the denim ahead moves away with the same speed that sank your parachute. There is a *clunk* and a lurch as the woman diengages the brakes on the stroller, and you're away again.

This is not how it's meant to be!
1321212122.title: Back Out Again

13212121221.content:
Lesson learned. From now on, no more help from the giants. As fun as this game of hitchhiking and parachuting could be, it wasn't why you came all the way out here.

Time to get back to the basics. Time to leave.

Climbing up the polyester, past the... unnecessary large feet of the girl, you peer down off the edge. It's, quite the drop, actually. There's got to be another way, right?

No, it's got to be this. The carpet is rushing by increasing fast, and soon it'll be replaced by concrete as the stroller tools out of the library. You need to jump, and you need to now.

With all your strength, you push off. You angle yourself to the side, hopefully with enough power to get out of the walkway. Being crushed would put a damper on all this, after all.

You hit the ground. It hurts, but nothing feels broken. You give yourself a moment to laugh. You did it! That stupid high jump was nothing! You are a survivor, and you were going to-

A morbid crunch floods the air as the front wheel of the stroller rolls over your feet. You scream, but it feels distant; you're in shock, at both the pain and the sight of your feet having been turned to a red speck on the speckled plastic wheel.

This is it, you think to yourself. I can't be a survivalist like this. I'll have to regrow, rejoin society, now with this disability. Oh god, have I made a horrible-

Your scream turns shriller as the rear wheels roll over the rest of your legs. Complex thoughts leave you behind; your mind is just a bellowing give of pain. Blood, warm and sticky, pools beneath you. The ceiling, distant and blurry through tears, is all you focus on.

A last, single coherent thought forms. I'm so damn small. Then the ceiling is replaced with he smooth sole of the mother's shoe, worn down by months of walking. It comes down on the rest of you, and the screaming stops.
13212121221.title: Traffic

choices: Stick with the staffer
Go off on your own into the library
Check outside for... maybe some rainwater?
13212121222.content:
You play it safe. No need to jump from this conveyance at top speed. The woman will stop soon, you'll get down, re-assess and adapt. This has been a trial by fire for your new way of life, and one day you'll look back on this and thank the unknown mother for her harsh lesson.

She's pushed the stroller an incredible distance in a few short seconds, and as the wheels lurch to a stop you scamper down past the daughter's feet to look toward the ground. Carpet. So, you're still inside the library. But as you scramble down the stroller to the ground, you can make out snatches of conversation as the woman talks to someone else, about checking out a book...

So, you're at the entrance, pretty far from the toilets. But there is a library employee here; you could tag along with him or her to get to the staff breakroom if you wanted! Unless, of course, you've had enough of being abused by giants today!
13212121222.title: Change of Plans

choices: The bathroom
The break room
A reader with a water bottle
132121212222.content:
Instinct tells you to play this safe as you cower beneath the checkout counter. As much time as you could save hitchhiking with the librarian could be lost if you're taken out of your way. Just look at what happened with the damn stroller; instead of getting that fresh drinking water you were nearly killed like three different ways.

Once the mother and daughter walked out of the way ("Good riddance"), you began to move, an eye out for anyone who even turned in your direction. You could still make it to the restroom before nightfall, but you'd have to camp out for the night there, which is considerably less than ideal.

Of course, there's another option. If you've got the layout of the library right, you're extremely close to the break room, even without riding a librarian. It'd be half an hour, hour tops, to walk there, leaving plenty of time to find water and head back to camp before night. Plus, you might find some food there. You stomach is beginning to grumble, and you left all of your food back in the shelves. Of course it's dangerous with the librarians and browsers stomping around, so perhaps it would be better to play it safe.

Of course, some of the people visiting are making long stays to studya nd read books, bringing snacks and drinks beside them while sitting at tables. They could provide sustenance?

Waiting for a couple of young girls to move out of the way, you sprint across the path, heading towards...
132121212222.title: Pathing

choices: Camp in the bathroom
Head back to your shelves
Try to climb higher
1321212122221.content:
Yeah, yeah, adventure and all that. But today has already had more than enough excitement, so, at least for now, you're playing it safe.

If you could help it, you didn't take a single risk. Shelves were used as cover, isles were only crossed if they were completely empty, and if you saw someone coming your way you dove right back to cover. The results were.worth it though, as you now stand in the entrance of the restroom, hours later without a single close call.

In the distance you hear the click of the lock as the last librarian leaves for the night. That makes the time ten, if they hadn't changed their schedules.

You grimace. Ignoring the time to collect the water and factoring in the shortcuts you could take in a patron-less library, it would still take the greater part of the night to return to camp. If you wanted to sleep tonight, you'd have to do it in here.

That's a future problem, anyway. Water was first. You drink down the last of the water you brought with you, then march into the nearest restroom, unable to see the markers that separate men and women, not that anyone will see you anyhow.

"Damn it," you shout to no one in particular, staring at the sink far in the sky. For once in this library's entire existence it wasn't leaking. But you couldn't leave yet, not without water.

drip

You sigh. It's not hard to place where the dripping comes from, and dejected you head to the stall. Pooled around the toilet, leaking from a slight crack in the porcelain base, was a puddle of clear water.

You fill your canteens. Pushing thoughts of illness and disgust aside, you plot your next move.
1321212122221.title: Water at last

choices: Stay and collect food
Try to get to the room as quickly as possible.
Get closer to the giant to see if there's anything more
13212121222211.content:
It's been a whole day, and you've spent it trekking back and forth across this giant building without rest. And you haven't eaten anything. To journey back to your original camp - which rests atop a high shelf, let's not forget - would be too much for you. Your body needs sleep, so this toilet cubicle will have to make do.

It's not comfortable, but as you make your way back to where the toilet pedestal meets the wall, you're safe away from the intrusion of any giants. Shivering a little at the cold, you curl yourself up as much as possible, and tell your stomach to shut the hell up. Tomorrow, you'll feed yourself, devise a new plan and perfect your new way of life.

Waking from a dreamless sleep, you clutch at your tummy at it groans loudly. Your next course has been decided for you! Before a new campsite, or some materials, you need to secure a source of nutrition. Within the confines of the library, that leaves the staff break-room as your only sure option.

Taking a little water as breakfast, you secure your pack and begin trudging across the rest-room's plain floor. It's easier going than the carpeted main area of the library, and in a few short minutes you're back amongst the stacks. Having memorised the layout of the building as part of your pre-shrinking preparation, you are not deterred by the ultra-skyscrapers blocking your view. You just follow ancient history until you get to the meeting point of romance and horror...

As yesterday, your slow progress - slower even, since you're so hungry - means you don't arrive before the oncoming storm of giant patrons and staff breaks - and you are no longer alone.

Progress slows even more as you now become cautious, taking no risk at all to avoid getting caught underfoot. At this rate, perhaps you'll reach your promised land just in time to collapse asleep again?

But then, salvation! Ahead of you, on the carpet, lies a boulder, bigger than your head. It smells good. Sparing a glance for the giant currently dominating the aisle, browsing some titles, you creep closer and note that it is a crumb, most likely of some baked good. A little hard, but in your condition you tear at it ravenously.

Another crashes to the ground, and you realise that the person - man or woman, you don't know - ahead of you is snacking on something while they browse! It's not the most nourishing fare, but you could stay here for a while to see how much in the way of supplies you could collect, or you could just use that new energy charge you've gotten to forge on ahead to the break room - every moment you spend out here is another one you'll have to pay for in sleep!
13212121222211.title: This Will Have To Do

choices: Get out of here as quick as possible!
Wait for the better time
Try to find a pocket or something to shelter in
13212122.content:
No! Your foot still struggles against the thick webbing of the diaper as the entire structure is lifted by the girl's mother. As the goddess goes about her business, you turn from escape to protection, raising your arms to cover your head and closing your eyes. Perhaps a prayer or two escapes your lips, but there's no one around to hear.

You certainly can't hear yourself above the rustling of the fabric, the cooing of the mother to her child, and the girl's delighted roars in response. Somehow, you survive, and once the storm has settled you find yourself able to breathe again, and behind you the child does so on a much larger scale.

Things to be thankful for? At least this is the outside of the diaper. To be pressed against the skin of this monster would have been more than you could handle. And with the canopy of the skirt above you, you are shielded from view. If you die here, it'll be completely accidental.

With embarrassment, you realise that you could have escaped simply by removing your foot from your shoe. Your reluctance only comes down to not knowing when you'll again be able to find that design in your size!

You can get away any time you want. But do you want to drop off now, and be stuck high on this changing shelf? You could instead just show a little patience, ignore the monstrous toddler all around you and wait until she's been put down to a lower elevation.
13212122.title: Just Another Speck

choices: Head to the edge
Move back to the fold
Ninety degrees
132121221.content:
You pop your foot free of the shoe, and hold tight as your leg swings free. Pausing only to retrieve your footwear - such protection is vital in any survival situation - you climb down the diaper toward the changing shelf.

The girl wriggles a little as her mother tends to her, although those gentle movements are terrifying seismic events to you, and her burbles deep-pitched roars. You move slowly, forcing yourself to remain calm. If you move too quickly, you'll get the woman's attention, and she'll swat you.

So, you eventually emerge from the shadow of the child, looking up at her bulk for only a moment before she is swept into the air by the powerful arms of her mother. Pure awe leaves you watching the adorable sight of a mother lifting her laughing daughter to her face, to rub noses. Magnified a thousandfold, such candid sweetness draws a big ol' smile to your face. It may have been an ordeal you've suffered these last few minutes, but seeing gods enacting a routine human act is a once-in-a-lifetime experience.

Aaaand that lifetime may be ending pretty soon! As the woman turns, about to return the girl to the stroller, you realise what is soon to happen. You are standing on the shelf of the baby-changing station, which the mother will soon flip back up to the wall! You have to get clear before you are caught in it, but should you run toward the edge of the tray - where you'll end up higher once it's all over - or down toward the hinge - where you might be able to squeeze out through the bottom? Or run at a right angle, Prometheus-be-damned?
132121221.title: Enough Is Enough

Unfortunately you forgot to check the weather forecast this morning and a strong gust of wind pushed your drone into a death spiral forcing you to go in manually. Trying with all your might to pull up you smack the ground hard skipping across the pavement. the crash was so violent you passed out except the drone was still flying. Your head was throbbing from the accident and you weren't sure where or what happened. You was meant to go to the city except all you can see below is farmland and woodlands as far as you could see. The sun was starting to set so it had been a while and the drone was losing power and started to lose altitude. Thinking quickly you choose to make a crash landing near what looks like a barn. With skilled piloting the drone flew into the barn and softly in a pile of hay. Plugging in the drone to recharge was the first priority and as luck would have it a socket was close by. It was out of reach but not unobtainable using your mind you brought a stick over to the wall climbed up it and plugged in recharging the drone. It's difficult to search for an area that you can be safe from all these 3, but you're able to find a place that was suitable for survival. With the outskirts of the city, you see a large residential section which was perfect for you to survive and dove your machine towards that spot.

However, you notice that the neighborhood is broken down into three sections. One was a typical looking suburban community and south from that place was an area full of apartments. Far away from both them at the north, there was a rather luxurious section full of large houses.

You gonna have to choose which one of these are better for you.

Which one will you choose?

Run out of this garden
1341.content:
Your drone skims through the sky, dropping a little lower to get a better view of the details. There's an impressive amount of foot trafic in the streets of the suburbs, and always people moving in groups: from young adults hanging around together, to children at play, to older people meeting to exchange gossip.

The houses themselves are small, packed close against each other. Fences keep them apart, but people are leaning over them to chat with their neighbour at regular intervals. A real close community, that's what this is. Seems safe.

Still, when you land, you want it to be away from people, so as not to get spotted and captured by a giant. Thus you direct your flight path away from the centre of the area, to its periphery, where the crowds thin out and you find yourself hovering above an empty garden.

Sure, the garden is littered with kids' toys indicating that there are some here, but you can see none right now. And most of them are almost buried by the untrimmed grass - the place is pretty overgrown, and you suspect it doesn't get a lot of care. The perfect place for an unseen landing.

Crack! A drone's fan stops working, and you're going down! You clamber across the machine, looking for how you can fix it, and see a cannonball embedded in its wing, having torn through vital mechanisms.

No, not a cannonball... You're three-quarters of an inch tall! That's just a ball bearing, fired from a bb gun, not a cannon!

It makes little difference as you crash into the garden, your drone whining as it bounces before drawing to a halt, its remaining fans sputtering and dying. Well, looks like your landing zone has been chosen for you!

"Ain't no-one spyin' on my property with a god-damn drone!" someone shouts, and you can feel the shudders through the ground of approaching footsteps. That kinda solves the mystery of the shooter, but doesn't decide what you should do next.

You could stick with the drone, hide under it and let the giant carry you away when they pick it up. A chance of being spotted, but hopefully they're not that observant.

Or you could run into the long grass, hide until the shooter goes away.

But why stay here at all? You should just run from this crazy place, toward the street and somewhere safer to start your tiny survival!
1341.title: The 'Burbs

13411.content:
You choose to stuck with your drone and get carried into who knows where; hopefully not into a trash bin. You got off the damaged drone and hide underneath it, grabbing onto the drone so that you wouldn't fall off. You hear the footsteps of the one who nearly shoot you coming this way. You look up to see who was the shooter and there you were able to see what the giant looks like once they got there.

He is a large (even by normal-sized standards) and muscular man in his 30s with black hair along with a mustache and a slight beard. He wears a black sleeveless jacket over a blue shirt, brown baggy jeans tied by a black belt with a grey buckle, and a pair of black work boots. By the looks of his attire and the sounds of his voice, he appears to resemble a stereotypal southerner man.

"Damn kids and their fancy gizmos" He grumbled as he picks up your drone with you holding on time. "I'm gonna make sure they dont mess with me once I throw it away."

The good news is that he didn't see you, and the bad news is that he's going to throw you away. You thought about letting go the drone and leaving the backyard once he approaches the garbage bin. You first wanted to stay here as your temporarily shelter, but you certainly lost interest and decided to find another place to stay. However, your mind is quickly changed when you heard a voice calling from the house.

"Come in Hon, dinners ready!"

You look at the house and saw another giant standing at the doorway. She appears to be a tall (once again, even by normal-sized standards) and attractive woman also in her 30s with long blonde hair with some pink shades on top of her head. She wears a white sleeveless top, tight blue jeans that was tied by a brown belt with a black buckle, and a pair of blue and green flip-flops. You can tell that this giantess was this giant's wife, and she looks absolutely hot. Her curvy figure was sexy to look at and her southern accent was stunningly good to your ears. You now decided that wasn't so bad staying here.

"Not now Mabel, I'm tryin to get rid of this darn toy." Said the man.

"Well you can either throw the darn thing away or brin it here, George." Said his wife "The kids are back from school."

You look at the man and silently beg for him to take you with him so you could see his sexy wife.

What happens next?

choices: Get back to the drone, see if it can be fixed

Approach Dahlia for potential transport around the house

134111.content:
This giant, this George, lumbers toward his house, the drone to which you cling swinging at his side. It's not ideal, but you get a decent enough view, even if half of it is blocked by his powerful leg.

Mabel steps to one side as he saunters through the front door, and you get a look at some of the interior decor. It's as chaotic as the garden, the floor cluttered with trinkets and rubbish, perfect materials for a shrunken scavenger like yourself. Higher up, guns and animal skulls hang from the walls, terrifying doomsday weapons and the remains of ancient monsters from your view.

"How was school, kids?" George rumbles, turning to face a small kitchen table.

Sitting at it, leaning over the dirtied tablecloth, two creatures, ginger-haired children of identical aspect, fumble something between their giant hands. With their mops of aubiurn hair and dungarees, gender is indeterminate for these middle-schoolers, and your attention is immediatley drawn more to what they carry as one finally gets flame roaring from the lighter.

"We din't learn much, pa, but we did get to burn a few insects," one smiles.

"Yeah, they burned up real good!" the other laughs.

"Tyler! Durden! Keep that fire away from the baby!"

The twins look suitably chastened as their mother walks behind them, each earning a cuff to the back of the head powerful enough to crush one such as you. Your eyes follow Mabel's magnified beauty as she walks across to the other side of the table, where the baby itself sits in a high chair, clapping in idiot delight with its pudgy hands.

Those hands begin to grasp in your direction as its squinting, ugly eyes lock onto yours, gasping as it sits up, reaching for you!

George misinterprets his child's intent. "Naw, this ain't for you, kid!"

With a simple swing he sends the drone soaring away, and once again you experience weightlessness before it all comes crashing down.

Dust erupts as your damaged vehicle thuds into the dull, brown couch, and you roll apart from it. Yow, this place really could use a clean...

"Hey! Watch it!" The mightiest strike of all impacts your vehicle, a kick pushing it over you and up against the armrest. Arms above your head, you look across at the retracting boot, and the giant wearing it. With her shoes on the furniture, she's clearly not too caring of what others think, emphasised by the trashy, rebellious clothing draped over her form.

Another loud bang heralds the popping of her pink bubblegum, before she drags the remains back inside her mouth to be crushed between her teeth some more. Once revealed, you can see the details of her teenage face, and realise that Mabel can't have been much older when she gave birth to this girl.

"This fuckin' place. I hate it here..." she mumbles, looking back to her phone again, unaware of the three-quarter inch man sharing the couch with her.

"Now, now," her mother says, stepping closer and throwing you into her shadow, "don't be glum, Dahlia. We all love this family, don't we?"

You're not too sure about that. Do you want to spend your time surviving inside this place, with these people? Resources seem abundant, but with kids that like killing insects amongst others, is this really the sort of place to try and eke out a tiny survival?

Everyone else leaves the kitchen
You decided to fix the drone first

You pick them up and put them all inside your backpack; you don't know what to do with them, but you know they may be useful later on. You said after putting the pieces away.

Just you were about to go towards the kitchen, your heart nearly stopped when you saw those destructive twins running into the living room. You first thought that you were going to be a goner there, but you realized that they were heading outside as they leave through the door, just like you thought.

Good now with those little monsters out of the picture, you can now go there without worry.

"You want me to help ya, Ma?"

You look across the kitchen and saw the black boots walking into view. You look up and found out that it was none other than Mabel's disgruntled daughter, Dahlia.

"Yes Dahlia, now come here and help me clean off the darn mess."

Dahlia picks up a nearby broom and joins her mother cleaning the kitchen.

Looking at the teenage daughter, you think that you may have better safety on her boot than here. It doesn't look like it has better handholds, but at least you can get your mind off of Mabel while you're there.

What happens next?
1341112323431.title: Putting Your Urges On Hold

choices: Mabel smashes you with her own broom
Dahlia stoops to scoop you up in her hands
"Where's that fucking drone?" George shouts, distracting everyone
The twins run back into the room in a stampede
The baby begins to cry, getting Mabel's attention
13411123234311.content:
Yeah, if you can get to Dahlia, you'll be further from the source of your desire, and thus will be less compromised. You'll be able to concentrate upon survival, without the distraction of Mabel's body.

So you drop from the mother's sandal, looking across the scattered debris to the mighty black boot of the daughter. Setting off at a dash, you fail to account for one fact: brushing up trash as she is, Dahlia's eyes are looking downward. At you.

"Hey! I think I see that bug that bit ya, ma!"

"Well? Don't just stand there! Fuckin' kill it!"

Crap. With the two giantesses boasting bird's eye views of your surroundings, how is it that you can survive this? Maybe you can hide somewhere amongst the rubbish until they forget about you?

"Aw, ma, there's no need for that! It's just a helpless little thing!"

"Now's no time for yer goddamned hippie crap! Bad enough you won't eat meat. Now you won't even kill an insect? If I didn't know any better, I'd swear you were no daughter of mine..."

A stay of execution? The floor trembles with the merest movements of these two goddesses, and you look upward to see that broom of doom held tightly in Dahlia's hands, trembling as she thinks about what to do.

Of course, the matter may be taken out of her hands...
13411123234311.title: Hope For Mercy

choices: Dahlia as she wants to take you outside
Mabel as she is going to take a shower
The twins as they are going to brush their teeth
134111232343112.content:
With the quiet intensity of the two giantesses going on as Dahlia ponders what to do and Mabel waits for a response from her daughter, you take this as a chance to run away while you can. However; before you can even move an inch, the giant daughter quickly scoop you up in her hands and cover you inside.

"Disgusting! What do you think yer doin, young lady?" yelled Mabel, not pleased with her decision.

"Calm down Ma, I'm just gonna flush this here bug in the toilet." said Dahlia. "It won't bother us anymore once it's gone, how's that?"

Mabel looks at her daughter's face for a brief moment and then smiles. "Huh, that's sounds like a good idea. I guess I was wrong about ya, Dahlia."

"Thanks ma, now let me take care of it myself" she said as Dahlia leaves the kitchen to the bathroom, taking you along with her.

You were now panicking after you heard what she's going to do with you. There's no way you can survive without drowning in the water. Even if you did, you can't last any longer in the sewer, unprepared for many dangers in there. You try to find a way to get out of her hand, but you are completely trapped.

You hear her opening the door and going inside the bathroom. You just sat there and wait for your demise. However, Dahlia drops you onto the floor and then flushes the toilet.

"There Ma, the bug is gone." called Dahila.

"Thank you sweetie, now get yer and help me." you hear her mom calling from the kitchen.

As the girl leaves, you realized that she is just trying to take you in another room while her mom isn't looking so that she can spare your life. This is also good idea for you as you can remin here for time being while you wait until night falls and after that, you can go to the garage to fix the drone without getting interrupted.

As several hours pass, you just walk around in circles in the bathroom. So far, George haven't saw the drone yet, maybe he lost interest in it or something. You look at the window and saw that dusk is slowly approaching. It's getting dark right now, but you're pretty sure you could survive here since nobody haven't came here right now.

It looks like your mind has been readed again as the door knob turns and opens to reveal someone coming here to use the bathroom.

Who is it?
134111232343112.title: Alone In The Bathroom

choices: Allow Dahlia to pick you up to take outside
Run away and hide from Dahlia
Reveal to Dahlia that you are human
1341112323431121.content:
Backlit in the doorway, the terrifying silhouette of Dahlia, great grimy boots alone towering over your pathetic form. Is she here to use the toilet, ignorant of your presence?

No, she stoops over you, reaching out again with her humungous hand, which against all reason had previously saved your life FROM being crushed.

"Coast is clear. Let's get you outside," she says in thunderous tones.

Well, that would get you out of this murder house, but to would take you away from the drone. You could always run away from her; you could get under one of the cracks of the cabinet and hide out of her reach to keep your survival private. At the other extreme, now that you're alone with her, you could reveal your humanity to her: she does seem friendly, and with her help you could get the drone back easily and get out of here!

A tremendous risk though, trusting a massive teenager with your fate...
1341112323431121.title: The Care of Dahlia

choices: Yes, it's right where you put it
No, it's already dumped in the trash bin
No, it's now somewhere inside the house
13411123234311211.content:
Before you could decide on what to do, Dahlia has chosen your fate and quickly swoops you up; you didn't even have the chance to move away. Her hands also have covered you once again so that means you can't even escape. You could at least get out here but you know that you shouldn't leave your drone behind, maybe you'll find a way to get to the garage.

"Okay we here now." You hear Dahlia said. She opens up her hands and lower you towards the open door. "C'mon now, yer free." Dahlia shoves you outside and you tumble down to the concrete pathway. You tried to get back inside, but she quickly closes the door, leaving you all alone in the dark.

Well, you are finally out of here, but you still need to fix your drone. You don't know how are you going to retrieve it back so you decided to the garage door to find some kind of route.

Luck has shine on you again, it appears that the door is nearly opened, leaving a small gap; looks like someone forgot to close it. You go for the door and look inside.

It's too dark to see where your machine is so you take out your flashlight to look around.

Did you found the drone?
13411123234311211.title: Out Of The House And Into The Darkness

choices: It's George, unable to sleep and checking out the drone
It's Mabel, having a late-night cigarette
It's Dahlia, sneaking out of the house
It's Tyler or Durden, after a midnight snack
It's an unknown intruder
134111232343112113.content:
Blast, the drone isn't here. Guess George wasn't too eager to get on with tinkering with it. By the light of your flashlight, you work your way across the vast plain of the garage to the door leading to the house interior. Like much of the rest of this residence, it's in poor repair, and a large enough strip at the bottom has been damaged that you can crawl beneath it.

In the house proper, you look around a world in darkness. Last you saw of the drone, it was beneath the living room couch, so you trek in that direction. The junk that litters the floor takes on a whole new, terrifying aspect at night, and crawling past and over every little thing takes so much time.

It's not silent, either; all this trash has clearly attracted bugs, and you can hear them skittering out there in the dark. You pull out your weapon and hope you'll never have to use it.

Then there's louder noise: great, crushing impacts that can only be a giant's footsteps. Killing your light, you shelter beneath a discarded cigarette packer - you wouldn't want to be spotted!

It's dark again, but you can see a light far, far above you, like a lighthouse guiding a ship. Whoever it is that walked in, they're using their cellphone light to look around. They step closer, and as their heel impacts beside you, mercilessly flattening another mighty structure, you get a hint at who it might be.
134111232343112113.title: Night Wanderer

choices: You go out and spy on Dahlia after you finish
You decided to stay here after you finish
You hear Dahlia coming back in to get something quickly
1341112323431121133.content:
You look up at the giant silhouette near you and once the light beams at the figure, you can finally make out the familiar face of Dahlia. You noticed that she isn't dressed for bed and instead looks like she's going somewhere.

"Okay then..." You hear the girl mutter from above. You don't know why she's even here this late, unless she wanted to sneak out while her family is asleep. Dahlia begin to type some numbers on her phone and holds it on her ear; she is going to call someone. After a few seconds, you hear a "Hello?" coming from the phone.

"Hello it's me, Dahlia." She answered "I just wanna say that I'm goin to meet ya at the park there, Trevor."

"I see that Dahlia." said the person named Trevor. "How about your parents?"

"They are asleep so they don't know a thing. Gotta make it quick since they're pretty darn strict about late night curfews."

"Okay then, hope I see you babe."

"Bye darlin."

After that conversation, you learn that Dahlia wants to spend a late night stroll through the park or something with her boyfriend despite her parents being against late curfews. After she leaves for the door and quietly leaving the house, it was now your chance to drag your device to the garage and finally fix it.

A few minutes of dragging the drone (and thankfully no one waking up) later, you inside the garage and managed to push the device through the door. You turn on your light and shine around until you can see some toolboxes on the ground; it looks like you won't be climbing up tables just to reach them.

You have a thought in your head, what is Daliha doing at the moment? It wouldn't hurt to follow her and her date to the park after you are finished fixing the drone.

What happens afterward?
1341112323431121133.title: Dahlia Heading Out

choices: Hide on the drone as Dahlia takes it with her
Drop off the drone and remain in the house
Alert Dahlia to your presence, explain things to her
Activate the alarm system to scare Dahlia off
Jump for Dahlia's pocket
13411123234311211333.content:
The drone is ready for your ministrations, and as you pause to briefly wonder how you'll make use of human tools, designed for vast giants so much bigger and stronger than you, the door opens and Dahlia re-enters, her rebellious boots crushing down as she rapidly approaches your position.

"Yeah," she says, no doubt still on her phone, "looks like Pa flung it in the car hole, like he thinks to fix it later."

The huge female stoops, her free hand grabbing and lifting the drone. Standing on top of it, you throw yourself flat to avoid being thrown clear.

"Yeah, he'll probably have forgotten about it by tomorrow," she continues. "You sure you can fix it? Cool. Yeah, that'll be lit. Okay, see ya soon!"

Hmm, this big girl is going to take the drone to see her boyfriend, he'll fix it, and they'll play with it for a little bit tonight. Sounds like they could get the work done for you, but after that tings are a little in the air! Maybe you should stick with them, keep an eye on how things go, but then again perhaps you should wait in the house for Dahlia to get back.

When they fix the drone, her boyfriend may keep it, so perhaps you should take the big leap and reveal yourself to her, let her know how things are.

Do you trust these kids to fix it at all? They may just break it more! Your drone does have an alarm system on it, which you could activate now to scare her off, leaving you to work on the drone yourself.

Lastly, perhaps hanging on to the drone like this might not be a guarantee you don't fall off. Maybe you could get into the pocket of Dahlia's trousers, ride things out there hidden from the human world.
13411123234311211333.title: An Interesting Toy Indeed

choices: Window
Roof
Front door
1342.content:
Apartments. Mainly occupied by professional couples as you remember this area, the rooms here should be rich in resources and poor in number of giants to avoid. No annoying kids, for one thing.

Your drone zips up the height of the building, peering in the windows that you can see. Cosy and warm, protected from the elements, these seem like perfect testing grounds for your tiny survival!

But how to enter? Flying in through a window would be direct, but there'd be no way to avoid being spotted if a giant should happen to walk in.

You could go even higher, to the roof, and work your way downward on foot. Laborious, but very safe.

Then there's the ground floor. If you can avoid getting underfoot, you could go in through the front door. Much more exciting and intense, before you settle in to your boring life inside an apartment.
1342.title: High Rise

choices: Head downstairs
Crawl through the crack
Make a leap of faith
13422.content:
Aside from getting blown by strong winds or eaten by hungry birds; other than that, going up the roof is a much safer option. You pilot your drone high up until you reach the rooftop. Thankfully, it wasn't that windy and there were no sign of birds roosting around here so you are in the clear.

You jump off the drone and bid farewell to the machine as it flies away; you'll be seeing it again someday. You look around for a way to enter the building and found a roof door that leads downstairs. It's a pretty obvious choice, but you don't really want to waste time going down the steps, don't you?

You walk a little bit until you nearly trip on something. You look down and saw that it was a slight crack. The crack was also small enough for you to crawl in so you go through there, but you have no idea were it takes you.

You have another idea; although, a rather dangerous one. You could jump off the roof and land on one of the balconies. Of course, it's damn obvious why this could end pretty bad for you.

What will you do?
13422.title: Up The Rooftops

choices: Stay where you are to gather water as a resource
Drop down to the soil of the plant pot to not be spotted
Call in your drone for protection
Attempt to get to the giant for transport
Perform another great leap to the balcony floor
134223.content:
You are three-quarters of an inch tall; your mass if insignificant enough that a fall of several feet should do little damage to you.

Should. You haven't done too much practice in laboratory conditions, but you are confident. The biggest obstacle really is the fact that you have to climb the small wall that keeps resular-sized people from falling off the roof. You dig in well with your tools and drag yourself up, sweaty work in this glorious weather.

Tired, you lie down for a rest atop your conquest after your countless minutes of climbing. Well, the drop should cool you down, at least. Wiping your forehead, you force yourself to peer off the edge of building.

Yup, that's a long drop, and that's just to the balcony below. A nice, big plant sits in a pot below, comfy green leaves that look like they'd be very comfortable to land on. With that decided, you jump off, doing your best to swan dive but instead tumbling out of control, the various pieces of survival gear you wear making you less than agile.

Winds rush past you, and time passes so slowly as that great tree of a plant gets closer and closer. It's almost a surprise when you thud into the thick green platform, which doesn;t give in the slightest to your pathetic assault. Once more you are gasping for breath and checking for damage while counting your lucky stars. Well, that and congratulating yourself on your correct assessment of the situation.

Thunderous, pounding footsteps bring your head snapping around to the glass-fronted doorway leading to this balcony. The silhouette of a giant, regular-sized person is getting clearer through the reflection of the outside world. Specific details on the monster are irrelevant: your keen mind sees the imminent threat in the form of the watering can it carries in its hand.

What should your reaction be?
134223.title: Tom Cruise Eat Your Heart Out

choices: You hide and stay in the balcony
You follow the woman as she gets inside her apartment
The woman caught sight of you
1342231.content:
You would try to get out and escape to avoid detection, but seeing that you forgotten to fill up your canteen before you left home, you could take advantage of this situation by using water from the watering can. However, there's a chance that you will probably get washed away and drown, but you can't start your survival without water so you have no other choice but to stay here and hope for the best.

The giant reached the plant pot and you finally got a good look of this person. She is a young woman in her 20s with long black hair which was tied in a ponytail and wears a red T-shirt, a yellow skirt, and a pair of black sandals. You watch as she lift the blue watering can and prepares to water the plants.

To her, it was just a simple pouring water, but to you; however, it was a raging waterfall that was enough to . "Maybe this wasn't such a good idea..." You said and quickly grab for the stem of this plant to avoid getting washed off. It somewhat helped as you nearly got pushed off the plant, but you were still holding on. Acting quickly, you take out your canteen and reach for the downpour. It was pretty quick of course due to the size as you immediately got a full bottle of water. Putting the canteen back into your backpack, the question is, how are you going to get out of here?

Thankfully, you don't have to think when the giant woman finally finish watering the plants so you are now safe from drowning.

What happens next?
1342231.title: Waterfall

choices: Stay still and let her see what you are for herself
Shimmy down the plant to the soil
Climb the plant to one of its leaves
Jump off the plant to the ground
Call in The Drone
13422313.content:
Of course she saw you. You're three quarters of an inch tall, clinging to the trunk of the plant she's watering, staring at her to determine every detail of her person.

You're still staring as she puts her wrists on her hips, watering can hanging loose. She's unsure what to do immediately, and may not well have identified you as human. You have a split second to take action, before she ruins everything!
13422313.title: Not Small Enough to be Invisible

choices: She leaves you behind
She takes the pot inside her home
She digs up the dirt to find you
134223132.content:
With an incredible capability to think quickly, you leap and latch onto the stem of the plant, climbing yourself down to the ground. You were too scared to look behind at the woman as you thought that she saw your attempts to escape and is currently thinking of a way to stop you so you just focus on reaching the soil.

Once you got there, you use your feet to dig through the dirt as you make your way underground...or at least tried too. It's a shame that you didn't bring a shovel with you for situation like this so you are gonna have to use your bare hands if you want to survive. With all of your might, you dig across the soil as fast as you can, using your entire strength from within you. You don't like getting your hands dirty, but it's not good to stick around here any longer.

You stood still after you finish with this. You were a little cramped in the tunnel, but you don't let it bother you as you just wanted to survive. After all, it was your intention when you first got here.

You have to no idea what the woman is thinking outside, but you hope she will ignore you and leave.

What happens next?
134223132.title: Buried Tiny

choices: Hang tight, hope the storm passes without touching you
Clamber up quickly, and hope you're not spotted
Pull more soil down, burying yourself completely
Dig further down
Dig for the roots of the potted plant
1342231322.content:
The world shakes, boulder-esque chunks of dirt tumbling onto your head in your personal pit. She must be carrying the pot somewhere, and you're along for the ride!

You can't see much of the outside world, but when a tremendous thump shudders through you you realise that your journey has ended, the world in which you lived laid down by the giant woman. How long should you remain in hiding? If you left now, would that be safer or more dangerous?

A patter of rain strikes the dirt above your head, only with droplets bigger than water balloons. Is she watering the plant again? No... That smells more sulphuric, more chemical, more... poisonous.

She's spraying the plant with insecticide! In your pit, you'll be drowned in this killer liquid! But if you climb out, she'll see you and be able to finish you off personally! What to do, what to do?
1342231322.title: Poison

choices: You resurface out of the dirt
You stay and move to a safer spot
The woman returns
13422313223.content:
You are stuck between two choice; if you go up, you'll be found and if you continue digging, you'll be dead. Thankfully, you thought very quickly to use the soil as a barrier from this deadly liquid and bring up the dirt to bury yourself completely. Like you said before, you do not like getting dirty, but this is survival and the first rule of surviving is to live while you can.

After burying yourself in the soil, you can feel the dirt becoming wet from the pesticide. You close your mouth and hold your breath as hard as you can; you must be careful not to inhale this chemical which has the capability to kill a tiny creature like yourself. Meanwhile, you can hear the woman finish spraying the plant and leaves it behind. This is finally your chance now; you can now unearth yourself from the soil. Unfortunately, the liquid isn't dry enough for you to get out, but you can't stay breathless any longer so you're going to need to get out right now.

What happens next?
13422313223.title: Shield Of Soil

choices: Harvest what you can from the plant
Try to gather some of the posion to use as a weapon yourself
Climb down to the floor and head inside
Explore the balcony
Stay and observe the woman's routine for the moment
134223132232.content:
No, the posion is too lethal to risk. The dirt, the lack of oxygen - that's survivable. You just need to calm your breathing, realx, enter a trance-like state to minimise your air consumption...

This was a survival trait that you did practice prior to this attempt at tiny survival, and so you lapse into a near-coma wondering how long this will be necessary.

You are dusturbed as the world shudders again - of course, the woman brought the plant indoors to spray it, and now she's taken it back outside, put it down with a crash, disturbed your concentration and panicked you once more.

Got to get out! You dig, pushing aside the dirt until you grab your hands around the roots of the plant. Using them as a guide, you head upward, hitting air right at the trunk of the plant. Here, no bugspray has landed, and you can breathe safely.

Well, you've avoided death, and hopefully the woman should be leaving the plant alone for the near future. Where to now?
134223132232.title: Six Inches Under

choices: The woman returns
You went back to the plant
An animal spots you
1342231322324.content:
You jumped off the giant pot and carefully climbed down the table leg. As you made your way down, you already plan to get inside the apartment in order to seek shelter there. However by the time you got to the ground, you forgot that getting passed the gate is impossible due to the lack of gaps. Because of this, you must wait here for the woman (or anyone) to come back here.

Oh well, at least you can look around while you can.

As you walk around the balcony, all you saw is some chairs, a smaller table, a radio on a small drawer, and a resting chair next to it. There's nothing too interesting about this balcony since it's pretty much just like any other balcony. You decided to make your way to the edge to see the view ahead. You don't have to worry about falling down since the rails are in the way.

You take a long view from where you are and there, you saw many apartments all around you; both big and small. Looking beyond, you saw the buildings of the city behind the apartments. You look to your left and saw the houses of the suburbs that can be seen across the gate entrance. Very closely, you catch a glimpse of a few mansions from the luxurious section that is far ahead. You look right and all you saw were a bunch of trees so there's nothing to see.

What happen next?
1342231322324.title: The View From Up Here

choices: Bring the drone down to distract her
Climb the bookshelves
Run and hide against the skirting board
1343.content:
The rich can afford to support a three-quarter inch tall man. They won't even notice. You'll get a chance to see how the other half lives. As you zip toward the stately manor on the outskirts of town, you're already letting your imagination run wild with possibilities.

The high security gate is no impediment to your flying drone, and you are soon passing over the garden and pool, scoping out the numerous cars parked up, servants cleaning them in the bright sunlight.

By the numerous giants pulling themselves through the water of the pool, you guess the house itself must be empty while everyone enjoys the good weather. Perfect.

An upper window is your entry point, where you won't be disturbed by anyone returning inside. Decked out with wood panelling, the room appears to be a library, numerous shelves of books taking up most of the space. As good a place as any to stash the drone.

Dismounted, with your trusty steed high up and out of sight, you stroll across the floor, amazed at how fine the carpet is, even at your scale. Money does buy quality, it would seem.

So, you'll have to dig out a lair in this deluxe dollhouse. While it's quiet up here, commuting to gather food every day would be rather costly in terms of energy. You need to locate yourself centrally, for convenience.

The door to the room is closed, so you'll have to scurry under. A little exercise after so long sitting on the drone will do you good!

A gust of wind sends you tumbling back as the portal opens before you, immaculate wooden cliff swinging out at the behest of the giant entering the room, immense feet crushing the fine fibres of carpet, a titanic vacuum cleaner pulled behind.

Looking up at the shiny black shoes, you curse the fact that one diligent maid is determined to clean house while everyone else is outside. How to get out of this deadly predicament?
1343.title: The One Percent

choices: You went out the door
You go for the maid
The maid is now approaching your location
13433.content:
You look to your left and saw a corner next the large book shelf. You waste no single time on this and make a running leap towards that spot. It was a pretty close one because you were nearly stepped on by this busy maid. Thankfully, she didn't saw you and walk to the center of the library.

You watch as she turns on the vacuum and begans cleaning the room, happily humming to herself as she works. At least that's what you heard because due to the sounds of the vacuum (which sounds more like a tropical storm at your size and less like a vacuum cleaner), it's hard to hear her voice. While you stood there, you could take a good look at this giant maid while you did.

She looks to be in her late 20s to early 30s with short burnette hair and wears a yellow French-style maid uniform which includes a dress, a white apron, brown stockings, and Mary Janes. You do admit that she does look kinda cute, but you don't want to get founded by her. She'll probably sees you as nothing more than an insect and murder you without question.

You look at the door and notice that she let it opened, enough for you to escape while you can. However, you do have another idea which was both quicker and dangerous at the same time. You look at the vacuuming maid and thought about hitching a free ride on her while she occupied with her work. If there really was someone else around this mansion other than her, you best to stick with this woman for safety. Of course, there's the possibility of being found.

What happens next?
13433.title: Take Cover

choices: Stay as you are, and trust to fate
Use your tools to secure yourself, cutting into the shoe
Head over to ride the vacuum cleaner instead
Climb higher on the maid
Try to get the maid's attention - and help?
134332.content:
No, if you go off wandering by yourself, you'll have no way of knowing when this mega-sized maid will come trundling along with her vacuum - she moves so much faster than you, she could sneak up on you and suck you up before you even knew it.

Were you to instead stay with her, you could guarantee not being devoured by her mechanical monster. Hey, maybe you could even learn her routine, get the layout of the house, and earn much more valuable information to enhance your survival odds.

So, you charge toward the huge heel of the maid's shiny shoe, crossing the fine carpet while she runs the vacuum back and forth under a table at the room's centre.

The plain working shoes have a very low heel to them, yet still your three-quarter inch self finds the form increasingly intimidating as you get closer. You're not even as tall as this woman's foot! She takes a step back and brings her weight smashing down right in front of you. You slam into the leather surface and collapse, trembling at the thought of her moving more and finishing you.

But no, she's merely stooping to allow the vacuum to get further under the table, squatting low. You take the chance offered, gripping at tiny imperfections and dents to pull yourself upwards. As your hands reach the top of you shoe, you thank heaven that her uniform includes stockings: were you to grab her skin, she'd feel you for sure.

Instead, you drag yourself up with the thick threads of those stockings, your feet balancing on the ledge of her shoe's heelside rim. No chance to get too comfortable as she stands up, and your dangerous journey begins.

Cleaning, she steps slowly, yet each time she raises her foot you are threatened with falling from her. At the moment, she's taking no more than one step at a time, but once she gets to walking at a steady rate, this will only get more treacherous. Now is the time to secure yourself better.
134332.title: A Maid to Measure

choices: You go for her pocket
You climb up
You wait for her hand
1343324.content:
At first, you thought you'll be safer on this giant maid's shoe, but you were also worried that you may fall off due to the sheer g-forces of her simple footsteps. It's obvious you can't stay here any longer, sooner or later, you are highly going to fall off at some point. You need to get much higher-up just be safe. Of course, trying to climb up her body is also very dangerous and might fall off along the way, but it's the only way to get a safer perch on this maid. So with that, you were going to do it anyways.

She was wearing stockings as you already noticed it before which makes it easier for you to climb up her leg plus it stretch all the way up her knee so that you can go grab onto her skirt since it's nearby. Now that you already made your plan, it's time to get climbing.

You again grab onto the stocking and began your journey up. The threads were thick enough to make things easier as they could support your weight. It didn't took too fast however, as the maid walks around which makes it very difficult to hold on; the most simple walking is like climbing a mountain during an earthquake. You try to hold on as much as you can; who knows when will you fall off.

Thankfully, you successfully reached the end of the maid's stocking and just like you expected, there was the hem of her skirt hanging over it. You focus carefully as you want to make sure you time it perfectly. After a few seconds, you make a leap for the skirt and managed to grab on to it.

"Whoa!" You shouted as you nearly slipped your fingers there. You grasp the bottom of her dress uniform as hard as you can since you were being swayed back and fourth while she walks around.

The loud sound of her vacuum finally stops as she's finally finished with the floor. Is it over now?

Not really, she picks up a feather duster and walks to the book shelves; she was now going to clean them. As she begans her work, you were now caught in the middle of a strong dust storm that was enough to blind your eyes. Coughing, you realized that you definitely need to take cover.

You noticed something on her apron that can help you; it was one of her pockets. Unfortunately, it's in the severe zone as it was closer to the shelf. You wanted to go higher as quickly as you can, but you're not sure if you can make it in time. You could wait here until her hand comes near you for you to grab on and get lifted to a higher level.

What do you do?
1343324.title: Going Higher Up The Mountain Maid

choices: Stay tight in this pocket
Hold yourself near the top with your head looking out
Climb out and head further up for her breast pocket
Climb out and head to her waist, to sit on her belt
Investigate what items she has in her pocket
13433241.content:
Dust continues to shower down as you clamber across the maid. The skirt is obviously less solid than her leg, and each minor motion of the woman sends ripples through it that threaten to dislodge you. Yet she still stands in one place as she dusts, even if she does reach upwards or downwards every now and then.

But nothing will stop you reaching the pocket. You drag yourself up and over, down into the depths. Safe. No chance of falling. Now you merely need to lie in this hammock of cloth until the giantess carries you elsewhere!

Although... Here, just below her waist, you don't really get a good look at where you are, and if you needed to leave quickly there might be a problem. Have you in fact trapped yourself rather than finding a way out of your situation?
13433241.title: Out of Your Control

choices: A bedroom
A bathroom
A parlor
134332412.content:
Fortunately, you managed to move around a bit and plan to get up to the pocket entrance. However, you were not going to climb out, instead you were going to take a look at where this maid is going after she finishes. It would be good to know what room you'll be ending up in next and see if you could find something useful there.

Thanks to this woman's slight moments, you were having some bit of trouble climbing upwards. With a desperate attempt at getting up, you use your teeth to grip on the fabric to avoid falling off. You would've use your knife to climb up, but that's way too risky; you might accidentally harm this maid and get her attention. So all you could do was use your mouth as you go.

Thankfully, the giantess has finished dusting the shelves once you got to the top. With that, she walks to the door, taking the vacuum cleaner with her. It was very hard to hold on to the pocket since her legs are constantly shifting back and forth making you slowly lose your grip on the pocket.

You could see the woman exiting from the library and into the hallway. Everything around you was quite grand as you expected from a huge mansion like this one. The maid carries you forward across the hall and towards her next destination.

Where is she going?
134332412.title: Pocket Ride

choices: Stay with the maid
Get onto the vacuum cleaner
Get onto the bed
Get into the wardrobe
Get onto a decoration
1343324121.content:
The maid stomps onwards, and you get a marvelous view of the house as if from a low-flying helicopter. Your vantage point shudders with each and every pace, but it's far preferable to being caught underfoot!

Way above you, the woman's mighty arm pushes open a door, revealing a bed chamber fit for the gods. Of course, scalewise it's for people far beyond you, of course, but it's also of a luxurious quality you've only ever seen in movies.

A four-poster bed, a variety of sculptures and plants and a walk-in wardrobe and -

It's all too much.

The maid stoops to activate the vacuum cleaner, and this could be a chance to jump ship if you fancy exploring this room a bit.
1343324121.title: Dust dust, Clean clean

choices: You explore the room
You go check out the wardrobe
You stay here
13433241213.content:
You wait patiently for this maid to move closer to the bed as she vacuums the floor. You decided to explore the bed first as you were honesty all tired from climbing this maid of a giantess so maybe you could rest there first before you can walk around the bedroom. Once this happens, you rocket yourself out of the pocket and onto the vast landscape of the luxurious bed.

"Wow, this is the most comfiest bed I ever landed on." You thought to yourself.

It feel like snuggling against a cloud ever since you landed here. It's so soft that you were even sinking on the mattress like a quicksand. It didn't even matter to you because you definitely needed to lay on something very soft like this.

Meanwhile, the maid has finished vacuuming the floor and goes to the walk-in wardrode to clean there. This is the perfect chance to explore this room while you can.

Then again, you can't just leave an extremely comfy bed like this, wouldn't you?

What happens next?
13433241213.title: The Bedlands

choices: You are woken by the maid changing the bedsheets
You are woken by somone angrily slamming the door as they run into the room
You are woken by someone throwing themselves onto the bed to cry
You are woken by someone entering via the window
You are woken by someone settling down to sleep on the bed
134332412133.content:
Oh God, this is good. Your mind screams that a bed bigger than normal should be less comfortable, as its imperfections are magnified. Yet your body protests, sinking deeper into the luxury of this field of soft, blissful comfort. You should just accept it, your body tells you, and let it last as long as possible.

Oh yes, you could get used to this. Maybe you should cut some of this material free to use for a bed of your own. Just after you close your eyes... for a little... nap...

Turns out that all that action has tuckered you right out, and your nap becomes a full-on sleep!
134332412133.title: Stay A While.  Stay Forever.

choices: You got out of the basket
You were taken to the laundry room
The ball of sheet is dropped in the middle of the hallway
1343324121331.content:
You really wanted to stay here a little longer; it's just so goddamn cozy. You were even dreaming about riding on a giant cloud in a clear sky. This cloud was like laying on a giant cotton candy and it feels like a squishy marshmallow when you hug it. Along the way, you would bounce on it like a trampoline. It was the most pleasant dream you ever have.

Until something happens.

The clouds all around you began to swirl around at high speeds like a tornado. It happens so unexpectedly that you fall off your cloud and into the abyss below. You scream and thought that you were going to die until you finally woke up and realized that the bedsheets were now getting removed by the giant maid. You are so focused by this incredibly comfy bed that you didn't notice this happening. You were not given a chance to escape as she removes the sheet and rolls it into a ball with you inside.

Now trapped inside, you couldn't tell what's happening right now, but you can tell that the maid puts this ball of sheet into a basket of other materials. You then realized that she's going to take them to the laundry room so that they can be washed. You better get out of here, quickly.

What happens next?
1343324121331.title: Your Rest Interrupted

choices: Climb on top of the basket
Climb out of the basket to the floor
Climb up the basket and onto the maid
13433241213311.content:
No! You're not going to die here, amongst some dirty bedclothing! So you fight, thrashing around in your bundled cloth prison. It's a miracle you weren't crushed completely by the maid's careless cumpling, and you have enough room to draw your cutting tool from its sheath and get to hacking.

The thick threads of the mass around you prove resistant to your attempts to jab into it, and you haven't enough space to swing it with any force. You've barely got space to breathe. You need to breathe. You need air; you need to get out of here!

Dropping the blade, you scrabble deperately, forcing yourself through every small gap you can find, up through a pitch black rockslide, constantly quaking with the steps of the maid as she carries a basket full of equally gigantic masses. As light, blue through filtered fabric, shines down on you you redouble your efforts, thrusting yourself upwards like a hungry dolphin. Breaking the surface to choke down lungfuls of air.

About you, numerous hills of bright, varied colours, surrounded by a wall of orange plastic in a circle. Above even that, the looming chest of the maid, a black and white monolith shaking your world as she strolls about her job, ignorant of the tiny prisoner she has ensnared.

Well, time to get out of here before this whole mess is fed into some industrial washing machine. Sure, you could scale that wall, get on top of the basket, and hang around there. But once up there, you could also just carry on a little further. drop to the ground and let the maid pass on by, alone once more on your quest for tiny survival. But why leave this poor lady alone? Climbing the wall, you could jump onto the material of her uniform, and let her carry you around some more. This time, you'll remember not to be distracted by a bouncy bed!

You've lost your weapon for your stupidity, and you'd best get something of equal or greater value from this or you're wasting your time...
13433241213311.title: Battle Against the Dirty Laundry

choices: You go with the businesswoman
You return to the maid
You leave both of them
134332412133112.content:
You went further upwards and managed to get to the top after a rough battle with the huge laundry. It's definitely not easy without your weapon as you needed to push everything in your path, but you're finally here anyways.

Above you, the maid rises above you along with her chest in front of you. She's looking ahead; not down to where you are. You leap and grab onto her uniform. Next, you climb down and slide across her leg until you got to the carpeted floor.

You have no idea if you really wanted to do this at all. You can't really survive on your own inside a giant mansion; you could wind up getting lost in here until you know the exact layout of this place. Thankfully, the laundry room is not too far away so you can just return to the maid if you want. However, you can't just stick up with her forever.

Suddenly, you could hear a series of sounds coming this way. They sound like high-heel clickings and it's assumed that someone is coming from behind you. You look to that direction and saw the figure of a giant woman in her 30s walking across the hallway.

She appears to be a professional-looking businesswoman with short brown hair. She wears a black suit jacket with a sky-blue shirt underneath it, a dark blue pencil skirt, a grey pantyhose and a pair of black heels. So far, she is currently talking on her cellphone; not noticing a tiny person on her path. You have no idea how long you been here, but it seems that you already have encountered one of the owners of this mansion.

As she gets closer, you have some choices. You could try to go with her instead as she's one of the head of this house, or go back with the maid you are already familiar with, or...maybe you could just go on your own without any help.

What do you choose?
134332412133112.title: The Big Lady Of The House

choices: Get onto the maid
Wait here for the maid
Enter the laundry with the maid
Strip away at the maid for supplies
Call out to the maid
1343324121331122.content:
The towering businesswoman stomps to a stop a couple of steps short of stepping on you, and you goggle up at her height as a loud noise announces she's clearing her throat.

Vibrations through the floor make you spin one-eighty, seeing the mighty maid walking up, stopping an equal distance from you. She pulls off a curtsey, an impressively smooth and quick motion for such a massive creature.

The other woman is not impressed.

"Honestly, Natalja. Must you wear that ridiculous get-up?"

"Mistress, it is simply the uniform for the agency, and I must -"

"Enough of your lies, girl. Don't think that I haven't seen the way you've been looking at my husband. Do not think that prancing about in that low-cut costume is going to steal him away from me. It would be so easy for me to dispose of you, and make sure you get deported back to whatever shithole country you crawled out of. Never forget that you're less than nothing to me."

"But, mistress -"

"No more! Now, get out of my sight and make yourself useful!"

She turns on her heel, and renders the ground shaky for a few more seconds as she walks. Once she's out of sight and shudder, you hear Natalja mutter some unknown words - swearing in a foreign language? Seems she's spending a good few seconds cursing out her mistress before she gets back to work, and that's your opportunity. This poor, downtrodden immigrant is going to be your guide around this house, but what approach should you take?

You could run up to her now, while she's standing still, and get onto her great shoe for transport. If that seems a bit dangerous, you could weait right here for her to conclude her duty in the laundry and come back out. But you could always scurry after her into the laundry and watch her work. Maybe there's even material for you to salvage while you're there?

Thinking of salvage though, perhaps you could tear some stuff off that huge shoe... Some tough material that could be VERY useful for construction of shelter!

Maybe you could try talking to this poor woman, get her help directly? While she's standing still, maybe she'll notice you in front of her?
1343324121331122.title: Master and Servant Relationship

choices: Your knife is still in the basket
Your knife was stuck on the cloth that is being washed
Your knife has fallen off somewhere in the laundry room
13433241213311223.content:
With your little weapon now inside the basket, maybe going to the laundry room with Natalja could give you a chance to retrieve it back. However, this is a big chance that it could wind up getting dump in there along with the dirty laundry, but at the same time it's blade might be pierced into the basket. Along the way, you could find something useful in there (and possibly a new weapon in case it's now lost).

After the maid finishes with her ranting, she picks up the basket and walks to the laundry room. There's no need to ride with her since it was very close, although it still took a while. You ran into the room and make sure you get close to the maid, hoping to get there in time before she dumps all the cloth into the washing machine. The room itself was very huge with two rows of many machines on both walls. Natalja puts the basket to the floor and starts to put the cloths into the machine one by one. You waited for a few seconds until she finished putting all of them into the machine.

You walk into the basket and hope you could see your knife still inside.

Is your weapon there?
13433241213311223.title: Follow The Maid

choices: Try and get Natalja's attention
Crawl through a hole in the basket to get onto Natalja's uniform
Crawl through a hole in the basket and drop to the floor
Lie where you are and let things happen
Climb to the top of the basket
134332412133112232.content:
Nope, nothing here. Shit! Where are you going to get a replacement weapon at such short notice?

So irate are you that you fail to notice Natalja the maid stooping to lift the basket again, sliding to one side as the floor lurches under her none-too-gentle power.

What's she doing now? Is she going to go get more clothes, or just place this basket out of the way somewhere? Either way, the lack of control you have in this situation is terrifying!

The maid's chest looms above you like a cliff-face, and the giantess is completely unaware of you down here.
134332412133112232.title: Lifted Up Once Again

choices: Natalja crouches low to hear you speak
Natalja raises a foot to stomp on you
Natalja faints in shock
Natalja shouts for her mistress to come and see you
Natalja grabs you in her fist as a way of making money
13433241213311225.content:
It's a risk. The biggest risk you've yet taken, yet one whose rewards could be substantive. You've lost your cutting tool, so gathering supplies will be difficult at present. This giant maid, this Natalja, could help you out a little. There's clearly no love lost between her and her employer, so wouldn't she like to help you steal to get a little payback? The thought of being waited on hand and foot by a creature one hundred times bigger than normal also has a little appeal...

You lean back, raise your arms and wave at the giantess above you. She's looking downward as she's muttering her curses, and cuts them off with a gasp as she spots the three-quarter inch man in front of her. That's not an everyday occurrence, and you have to hope that she reacts as you want, and not in one of the more... dangerous options that she has available to her.
13433241213311225.title: Partners in Crime

choices: Agree to help Natalja open the safe
Propose a counter-offer
Demand she get you food and shelter first
Pretend to go along, but plan to betray her to the mistress
Refuse outright
134332412133112251.content:
Natalja, this mighty maid, stoops over you. It is terrifying to see such a creature descend upon you, but at the same time it's encouraging that she's not just annihilating you where you stand.

That face looming above has raised eyebrows, a jaw lowered to reveal sparekling teeth - that's surprise if you ever saw it, so she must clearly see what you are. You shout up to her, a simple greeting, and her brow furrows. Clearly, while she can see and identify your form, she cannot hear your words. Blast.

The ground quakes even more as she brings herself closer yet, careless of getting dirt on her uniform as she smashes her chest down, her head now directly before you, pivoting so that he ear is just above the ground, an immense amplifying dish for any sound. Staring up into it, now you're chance.

You repeat your greeting, explaining that you are living here now, and would like her assistance in subsisting within this house. One final statement to hint that it would be a subtle way of getting back at her mistress, and the seed is planted...

A few seconds pass as Natalja waits to see if you've finished, then a sweeping breeze from her turning head, her whipping hair strands, knocks you stumbling. Now she is face-on to you, smiling as she speaks with the voice and authority of a god to the three-quarter inch man trembling before her. As a domestic servant, she must be exultant in having such power.

"Yes, I can help you, tiny man. I can get you food, I can hide you in house. But you will do something for me. My mistress, she has a safe, where she keeps her treasures. She does not trust me, will not let me see her open it. But you... I will put you on her, and you will watch her open it and tell me the combination. This is our trade, yes?"

So this woman wants you to help her steal from her employer. A small price to pay for your tiny survival - after all, what care yoiu for the politics of the giants, so long as you get to live?
134332412133112251.title: Reciprocity

choices: You take advantage of every moment to run away
You climb onto her show while she's distracted
The vacuum cleaner suddenly wheels into view
The maid tries to snag you with her feather duster
Natalja runs off to get some bug spray
134332412133112252.content:
Natalja frowns, and you are already running from the majestic maid as she raises her black shoe above you. It thunders down with unstoppable force, knocking you off your feet even as if impacts quite some way from you. Seems that she's dedicated to keeping this place clean, and won't suffer a bug like you to live. And with every one of her steps rendering you completely helpless, there's no way you can outrun her.
