Looks like your tiny survival adventure ends here.

But no; even as you're forcing yourself to stand, the woman's foot moves no closer, merely remaining beside you as a sheer black monolith. Hmm, maybe trying to stomp you was just an instinctive reaction, and now she's realised that she doesn't want to squash you into the carpet at your remains will just require more cleaning!

So, in some ways that's good, in others it's bad: now she'll try catching you in the vacuum, or catching you up in a bag or something! Your mind reels through several terrifying possibilities, with the dread feeling that you brought this all upon yourself with your rash action. Revealing yourself to a monstrous giant, what were you thinking?
134332412133112252.title: A Diligent Maid

choices: Climb Natalja to get to her ear
Harvest material from her while she's unconscious
Hide in one of her pockets
Back to exploring the house
Wait for the mistress to investigate, and then get on her
134332412133112253.content:
Natalja's eyes widen, and then she looks directly up. No, she's not looking - those are her eyes rolling back in her head as she faints! Running briefly crosses your mind, but you could never get clear of the impact zone if you were in it, so you just watch the impossible sight of such a giant collapsing before you.

The invincible pillars of her legs shudder and fold at the knees, then her unparalleled mass descends in an undigified pile, the noise and force of the toppled titan blasting you across the carpet to smack into the skirting board. By the time you stagger upright, head fuzzy and hearing dulled, what was once a skyscraper woman is now a ruined cityscape of human flesh.

Well, looks like your plan backfired a little, but you can still profit from this. Looking up at the huge, unconscious body, you reckon you could climb up her to reach her ear; maybe then you'll be able to get her attention! Unless this is all a lost cause now...
134332412133112253.title: Maid Down

choices: Make up a lie to satisfy the woman
Tell the woman the truth
Pretend to pass out from the pain
Ask to be alone with the mistress, not trusting Natalja
Have your drone distract the giantesses
134332412133112254.content:
A cruel smile creeps across the face of the majestic maid standing over you, and without taking her eyes off you she gives out a shout, thunderous voice echoing around these vast halls.

"Mistress! We have a visitor!"

You are frozen in place by that piercing gaze, even as the floor trembles once more beneath the returning footsteps of the business woman. "What is it, girl?" she snarls.

Natalja's eyes flick upwards, to the woman behind you, before jerking down to indicate you.

"I see," the mistress says. "Bring him to my office."

You turn to watch her walk away, then your personal space is invaded by the warm, powerful tips of the maid's finger and thumb, pinching close to lift you from the ground. To call the experience dizzying would be an understatement, as you are dangled the length of the maid's body while she follows her mistress.

The pair re-enter the library where you began this tiny survival expedition, now revealed to be the office for this businesswoman, seated at her desk as her employee brings you before her. Natalja dangles you directly before the other woman's face, and she smiles sweetly as she looks you up and down.

"I'd heard the rumours, but I never believed..." she breathes, even her simple exhalation sending you swinging back and forth in the maid's grip. "I find myself running over the options of who may have sent you, and the fact that this... process must be very expensive crosses a lot of the poorer families right off the list."

Sent you? What is she on about? Does she think you've been sent her as a spy by some business rivals?

"Still, that leaves a very long list. Now, before you answer, I think we should give you some incentive for what awaits you should you try lying to me."

She nods to the maid, and Natalja draws you away from her mistress, changing her grip so that you look up into her own impassive face, her thumb directly over your chest, your arms and legs no longer pinned. Natalja's free hand moves in, her other thumb and forefinger snapping tight on your left arm. Too tight.

Still with no emotion on her monumental visage, Natalja squeezes tighter and tighter, giving one small twist that wrenches your shoulder out of joint. You're screaming at that pain even before she grinds your arm between her digits, shattering every bone, pulping its form utterly.

Natalja shrugs at your agony, turning you to face her mistress, who is smiling widely. How can you give her information that you don't have? At least your functional arm is free now, and you can touch the controls of your drone recall device, and the drone itself is sitting atop a bookcase nearby...
134332412133112254.title: An Offer You Can't Refuse

choices: Natalja runs to her mistress to quit immediately
Playing things cool, Natalja slips you into a pocket for now
Natalja interrogates you, wanting to know where you came from
Natalja slips out her phone to make a call
Natalja decides to wreck the house before she leaves
134332412133112255.content:
Natalja's face flashes with surprise before she grins and laughs, and pounces upon you like a cat. Even were you expecting it, there's no way you could dodge as she cups her hands around an immense area, bringing them together to lift you up within a cage of indomitable flesh and bone.

As the fingers part to show the gleeful face of this domestic-servant-turned-goddess, you are already regretting your rash choice. Why should someone so powerful aid a pathetic being like yourself, when instead they can profit themselves. Even in this macro world, it's all about survival, not any concept of a 'common good'.

"Yes, you are tiny man," she breathes, filling your prison with her breath, carbon choking you for a few moments. "With you, I am rich! I need not work for that bitch any longer!"

This is not what you want. But how does Natalja behave now?
134332412133112255.title: Money-Making Mega-Maid

choices: You make it
Not so lucky
134333.content:
You decide what you're going to do. Leaving the room seems like the smartest idea. There's no reason to stick around in a room where a diligent maid is likely to be the death of you. The distance to the door is hard to gauge but you think you can make it while the maid is busy cleaning the other side of the room.

You start your trek to the door. Luckily, the carpet is not tall enough to significantly slow your speed. It was a very interesting, walking across a carpet has become a serious task. Something you used to do every day without any consideration. Thinking about your situation, you realized you would need to set up a source of food and water. Maybe taking up residence in the kitchen or nearby would be the best idea. Although, the kitchen carries other scary risks like being eaten or killed due to the higher traffic of giants. Something to consider.

You were about half way to the door when you checked on the maid's progress. To your abject horror the maid was no longer vacuuming on the opposite side of the study, instead she was pushing the vacuum at breakneck speeds right at you. You wish it felt like slow motion but unfortunately life didn't work that way. The maid was on you in seconds and you had barely moved an inch. The vacuum was approaching your direction and it was clearly going to pass over you. If you didn't get out of the way right now you would be sucked into the vacuum with all the dirt, dust, and other discarded nastiness.

Now was not the time for thinking, now was the time for action. With that thought you entered a sprint, directly sideways out of the path of the vacuum. You were certain you were moving faster than you ever have before but would it be enough?
134333.title: The maid approaches

1343332.content:
It's close. So very close. You feel the vacuum start to pull at you. Not enough to suck you away, but close enough to feel. You're so close to making it. A shadow over takes you as you make a final mad leap forward in hopes it carries you out of the way. You crash down on your back, still feeling the ever increasing suction. As the noise becomes deafening, you feel a horrendous pain in you legs as the front wheel of the vacuum runs over you. You scream in raw agony as everything below your thighs are utterly obliterated by the front right wheel. Before you can process anything else, the rear wheel runs over your legs again. The vacuum pulls at your body harshly, but the blood and remnants of your legs have become stuck to the carpet, preventing you from being pulled away.

As the vacuum continues past you, a second shadow over takes you. You look upwards, body frozen in shock and pain, and look at the maid who has ended both your adventure and life. She stands over you, from your perspective she might as well have been miles tall. She's still humming you realize. She just destroyed your legs and she's still happily humming away as she pushes the vacuum forward. She didn't even realize. Why would she though? She is just doing her job, and why would she notice or even care that she ran over a bug. And isn't that all you are now? By your own actions you turned yourself into a bug. Into nothing. Her mary janes crash on top of you. But you weren't dead, unfortunately. You were between the sole of her shoe and the elevated heel. Quickly as it occurred, the maid stepped off of you and continued forward.

You were left on the carpet, legless, bleeding, and soon to be dead. Your vision was fuzzy as you watched the maid continue cleaning. God she was pretty, you thought. Her soft brown eyes studied the floor for any specks to clean. Her french outfit hugged her curves perfectly and the way she moved. She moved with a sway in her hips that wiggled her cute ass as she semi-danced to the song she hummed. She probably didn't even realize she was doing it.

Without warning, the vacuum shut off. The maid looked around the room, studying the floor making sure she got everything. She smiled the most beautiful smile you have ever seen as she appreciated her work. That was until her gaze fell upon you. The smile disappeared as she took a step towards you. She continued to hum as she approached. You couldn't even beg as she walked forward slowly. It was almost like she was taunting you. The little speck which refused to be cleaned. That didn't matter to her, she might have missed it the first time, but she would make sure that whatever the red splot was, it would be gone before she left this room.

She pulls a cloth out of her back pocket as she stands over you, dominating your world with her presence. You made eye contact with the maid, barely conscious and fading fast. You look into each other eyes for what feels like forever. Maybe she recognized you? No. She didn't. You were nothing. Hell, you didn't even have a human shape anymore. Lying in a pool of your own blood you were utterly unrecognizable. The maid bent at her hips, her slim stomach and medium sized breasts overtaking your sky, bringing the cloth down towards you. The cloth increased in size as it got closer, eventually completely blocking off sight of the maid.

It made contact pushing you into the unforgiving floor as you once again screamed in agony. You could feel her finger poking you through the cloth, exploring your little body. You could feel a faint heartbeat even through the cloth. You wondered what it would feel like if she touched you directly. But the maid had no interest in actually touching you. You were a gross spot on the floor. And she was hired to make gross spots like you disappear. The pressure from the cloth increased tenfold as the maid began to twist her wrist back and forth in an attempt to get you out of the carpet. In no time at all, your body was destroyed and absorbed into the cloth like any common fluid, leaving a small red stain which would be washed out later that day. The maid brought the cloth away from the floor, looking over the carpet where you once were. She nodded satisfied with her cleaning, once again showing her pearly white teeth in her perfect smile. Another room cleaned. Without even looking at the cloth, she stuffs it into her rear pocket, where whatever chunks that were left of your corpse dropped to the bottom of the pocket to be even further obliterated every time she sat down or her outfit stretched around her generous rear when she bent forward.
1343332.title: Not Even Human

choices: The downtown area.
The train stop
Somewhere else. . .
135.content:
Flying high and into the sky was quite exhilarating. You didn't realize just how enjoyable it was with the wind against your face as you looked down below you, watching the world turn. It was like looking at little ants, scurrying about their way. . although as soon as you landed. . you’d be the small one. There was just. . so many different kind of options. Looking down, you see city hall. That would be an interesting choice.

You imagined seeing all the giants and giantess’ going around and trying to deal with political issues, as you listened from down below. There was one politician in particular that you liked too. You couldn't remember her name, but she was so young and beautiful. It would be quite the adventure living around her!!

Looking more, you spotted a nearby library. That would be. . really really hard for you to survive. With no way of obtaining food, you’d need to eat bugs, or even just skin from the patrons. Maybe some librarians would have some snacks. You remember seeing one of them bring a cake through there once, so maybe there was a stash in the back. It was so risky, yet. . it could work too.

Another area was a cool looking neighborhood. It wasn't exactly the most. . urban place. . but hey. It could be interesting living around a little neighborhood. Working your way throughout the system. The big question would be if you stayed outside or inside. You scratched your chin as you thought about it. There was a forest around too. . but forget about it. That place looks crazy.

These places, while interesting, were not really very ‘urban’ at all. They didn't really fall in line with the objective that you had set for yourself. They probably would lead to some pretty exciting adventures, but you wanted some true ‘urban’ living. It would be the ultimate test of evolution, surviving in a totally different kind of environment. Braving the elements that man had made for themselves. . a true testament to the urban experience.

There were two places that you thought would fit that mission well. First, was the downtown area. People, animals, and bugs were everywhere, so there was plenty of obstacles. There was also a ton of food and water. Leaky water manes, restaurants, people walking around with food, and even those food trucks would lead to a million possibilities on where you could establish yourself. The evenings would be particularly interesting. With all those parties happening all the time, you'd have some nice music to listen to. . as well as some pretty crazy people walking around drunk all the time. It would work nicely and be a challenge.

As you watched people scurry about more, you noticed a pretty Hispanic woman walking down a set of stairs into a train stop. Of course!! How much more urban could you get there!! That one might work out better too, because at a train stop, you’d have an absolute ton of people passing by daily, but they’d also be bringing food with them. You knew that the train stations had water faucets. . most of the time leaky due to the laziness of the city. Better still, they kept it kind of clean there, so you wouldn't have to deal with animals or that many bugs.

Thinking it over. . you decided to go towards. . .
135.title: Something else

choices: Down to Ciboulette
Over to the food market
Keep on looking
1351.content:
Surveying the downtown area from your birds eye view listed a good amount of locations that would serve a miniature adventurer like you well. The streets were lined with establishemts ranging from restaurants to food markets and much in between. Of course since your goal was to live off the resources of your surroundings, a building that contained a plethora of food would be ideal.

One thing to take note of, was that this was a very busy town and the foot traffic on any given day would be insanity to one such as yourself. As long as you kept to your senses and stayed careful you should be fine, but its just something to remember. Last thing you wanted was to be a glob of mush under someones shoe.

You pilot the drone closer to the ground, (still hovering a small distance above the roofs of the buildings), and prepare to make your final destination decision.

To your left, was as most of the customers of this place would call it, a 'charming little food establishment' called Ciboulette. You had eaten here once. It served as a coffee/pub house, open all hours of the day and served mostly vegan options. Normally, this would turn you away, evident by you only eating here the one time. However, it may not be a bad idea to eat a little healthier if you plan on living the rough life for awhile. It had a patio in front of it that jutted out into the sidewalk, and there appeared to be a group of young women sitting together at a table.

To the right of the street, right across Ciboulette, was a fairly sized food market. Now THIS place was obviously stacked with food! Nourishment wouldnt even factor as difficult to find here at all. The shelves would provide brilliant means of staying out of sight, exploring the market, avoiding stomping feet and grabbing a bite whenever you felt like it. Although getting past the packaging all the time would be a pain, and if the store got enough complaints of customers buying food with torn packing and pieces missing from it then they might call exterminators or lay out traps themselves. You were by no means as dumb as a pest, but in this scenario... you were definitely acting like one. And all it would take is one slip up to end up being stuck in a glue trap or something.
1351.title: Up above Downtown

choices: Operation: Rope and rappel
Operation: Fuck it and walk inside yourself
Operation: Come up with another plan
13511.content:
Ciboulette it is. You take the drone down farther until without about as much subtlety as a buzzing drone can manage, you land it softly on top of the frame of the open veranda, positioned above the patio and overtop the customers. For now, you were going to leave the drone up here. It would impossible to drive it into the building without someone noticing and chasing you down, so this was as good a spot as any to keep it safe and out of immediate sight for the time being.

Now, you couldnt use the drone to get you inside, and finding a way to ground still made you uncomfortable due to the waiters going in and out constantly... so you needed to come up with a plan you felt happy with, ideally before a hungry bird finds you up here.

Time to multitask, scan the skies and come up with the gameplan. Your backpack had a nice range of tools and supplies, though nothing that would help you out with vetting down from a height like this. Luckily, you saved the real heavy duty stuff for the drone to carry. You reach your hand down the side of the machine and lift the attached duffel bag from its position. You thanked yourself for your forethought and level of preparation, as this large bag plus the one on the adjacent side of the drone kept many useful tools to keep your puny self alive such as a crowbar, hatchet, first aid kit, an EXPENSIVE lifestraw, and the tool that would be helping you out here and now, two big ol' bundles of rope that had a combined total length of 200 feet!

You hugged the heavy yoga ball sized bundles to your chest, and carefully dismounted off the drone onto the veranda. With a loud thud you slammed the bundles down with your hands ontop of them and peered over the edge of the veranda, way way down to the occupied table below you.

You winced. "Damn... will this even be enough rope?"

It was hard to tell. Perhaps vertigo from being at such an altitude was throwing off your depth perception but... it looked like your standing on top of a mountian... with even more living mountains below this one!
Sheesh... loud living mountains by the sound of it. These women could shatter glass with their laughter. The spooky part was, it looked like most of the commotion was coming from one girl! A gorgeous blonde wearing a straw sunhat, grey long sleeved shirt and denim short shorts. The vibes you got from her were rich, snotty and obnoxious. It was a wonder her friends, (who all seemed to be more polite about their behaviour in public), could stand to be around her. They all appeared to be women in their mid twenties. And god were they all gorgeous.

But thats not the matter at hand right now. Right now it was time to get down to the plan, which was to get down there with them, wait for a server to arrive, then hitch a ride into the building and find a spot to set up camp.

Your only issue was with this rope,... should you go through the trouble of unraveling it, tying ends together and tossing it down only for its length to be too short? Maybe it was best to just try your luck with the drone taking you closer to the ground and just walking inside yourself?
13511.title: Down to Ciboulette

choices: Drop onto Jess's head
The blonde woman see's you!
Something is disturbing the drone above...
135111.content:
Judging the height down to the table was pretty difficult, but 200 feet of rope... that had to be enough, right? Whether it was or not, it was worth a try. Getting into that restaurant was imperative to living your survival fantasy and this was the safest way you could think of doing it, so long as you play it safe, slow and nobody spots you and thinks your a creepy arachnid.

"Damn," you thought. "Maybe I should have just shrunk myself in the bathroom of this place and took it from there.... no... I wanted an adventure, now I got it. Time to grow some balls pal."

With steady hands you grip onto one end of the rope on a single bundle and boot it off the ledge. You watch as it simultaneously plummets and unravels through the air until it finally straightens fully out and sways back and forth in the air. It covered a good distance from what you could tell. Perhaps the second bundle would be enough to cover the leftover. You tie the the rope to the second bundle with your best constrictor knot, grab onto the opposite end and toss it over the edge. The two seperate ropes combine to form a super rope thats so long you cant even tell where the bottom is. You anchor the rope around one of the drones propeller bases and step to the edge of the veranda.

Positive thoughts flow through your head. "This should do... time to get to it. Just a quick trip down a... long... long drop."

As steady as you possibly could, you began descending down the rope like you were in some kind of spy film down to the table. It was pretty tiring and after about 10 minutes you were nearly there. Unfortunately, the closer to the bottom you got, the more you realized the rope didnt quite make it to the table, instead it hovered slightly above the head of one of the women.

From what you picked up from their conversations as you went down, this woman was probably named Jessica though you werent a hundred percent positive as you werent exactly focusing on their chatting. You loop the rope around your boot and use it as a foothold to alleviate some of the strain on your muscles as you dangled their in the air for a much needed break.

This wasnt going to plan. The only way to get off this rope now was to get onto this Jessica woman and that was something you didnt know if you were prepared for. To be this small on a human being, like a bug, their body now an entire landscape to you! Your drop off point was going to have to be somewhere on her head from the looks of things. Picturing what a human scalp would look like from your view, ...what it would be like to wander around in this womans black hair like it was a forest. Or to walk on her skin... she was tanned, like a bronze gold tan, so she must be warm to the touch, especially on a sunny day like today.

It was creepy to think, but it gave you jitters. You hated the sound of that word, but it seemed to sum up your feelings perfectly. After all, aside from her gigantic form, she was also very beautiful. All these women were overwhelmingly intimidating to you, but she stuck out to you. Out of her friend group here, (atleast from what little you observed) she seemed to be the most reserved, laid back, cheerful, friendly... all the qualities that you would find endearing in a partner... but you were getting ahead of yourself. Right now, you just needed to get down to the end of this rope and leap onto her body before someone swats you out of the air.

You release your foot from the rope loop and start once again on shinnying down the rope. The blonde woman; the loud one, was getting mighty expressive with her storytelling as she revelled in the attention her friends gave her, as in waving hands, looking up, down and all around. She was having fun telling a story about what you gathered to be about an ex-boyfriend and what she referred to as, 'the gear shift incident'. Apparently there was a mishap during a fuck session in the unfortunate mans car seat, but that didnt matter. What mattered was her mannerisms. Her eyes tending to look upwards whenever she recalled her ex's stupidity, which actually put you directly in her point of view! If she was more attentive, she may end up spotting you and mistaking you as a spider or something. Which ofcourse would most likely mean your death.

Luckily, Jessica was very close now. A little further down and you would be able to safely drop onto her soft head of hair.
135111.title: Operation: Rope and rappel

choices: Scurry down Jessica's back to the chair
Make your way down Jessica's arm to the table
A massive hand prepares to relieve the 'itch'
1351111.content:
The blonde was lingering her sight in your area, currently entrapped in the juicy details of past conquests, her dramafied expressions were going to be the death of you. It was time to abandon rope, you couldnt take the dread she gave you anymore. You release your grip on the rope and land with a thud in the sea of black hairs atop Jessica's scalp, vanishing from the blonde womans sight for good.

You land on your gut, clinging to strawberry scented strands that suspend you above the surface level of her hair. Your measly weight wasnt enough to even break through upon your landing, which you were thankful for,... having to blindly navigate your way out of a womans hair was not on your to do list. What was a priority, was finding a way into that restaurants doors. Your initial idea that brought you here in the first place, was to get to a position that would allow you the possibility of hitching a ride on a server as they enter the building... but things hadnt quite gone according to plan. For instance, that gamble you took on the rope being low enough to get you straight down to table... well, hadnt quite panned out. But all was not lost,... having to taken an alternate route by dropping onto this womans head would just be chalked up to the 'an adventurer should always be prepared to adapt' mindset.

From your viewpoint above the hair forest, you watched as a handsome young waiter approached the womens table with their appetizer in hand; the classic vegetable and dip platter. Even though they kept the young man at their table longer than he should have been with conversation (and a dash of flirting from the blonde woman), you knew they was no chance that you could get down from here, onto the table, and onto him in time... not unless he felt like wasting work hours and losing his job.

As they were busy chatting, you were deciding what to do next...
1351111.title: Drop onto Jess's head

choices: You hit the floor
You fall down to the seat of the chair
You actually land on the back of the chair!
You crash into the passing server
You are caught in the wake of a passing car
13511111.content:
Sure, there's food on the table, but that food is being devoured by these gods, and at least one of them has eyes sharp enough to spot your tiny self. Best play it safe, keep from the line of danger until an opportune moment...

Scrabbling across the bouncy, dark surface of hair on Jessica's head, you look down the expanse of her neck to the back of the chair. A simple leap across for you to -

Jessica rolls back in laughter, and you lose your place immediately, thrown from her as the living mountain rumbles and crashes. Cast into the air, once more your careful plans are crushed by uncaring giants...
13511111.title: You Need Back-Up

choices: You plummet to the ground
You drop onto the table
As Jess moves forward again, you land on her shoulder
A member of the wait-staff intercepts your trajectory
You are cast into the street
1351112.content:
"Look out, Jess!" comes the roar of the blonde monster. "There's a spider about to drop onto you!"

The head beaneth you rolls backward, and as your eyes follow the movement you barely perceive the powerful, tanned and short-nailed fingers of the hand that sweep in from the side to swat you. The blonde has taken command, and her gargantuan muscles power her blow into you irresistably, snapping you free from your rope with the impact.

Shock rushes through your frame, your organs rattling within your bones from the energy of the woman's contempt. You spiral away in the air currents, landing who knows where...
1351112.title: Swatted

choices: You are stuck to the carrot
You manage to avoid it
You are pushed out by the carrot
13511122.content:
Miracles did exist! Here you were, spiraling out of control in the open air with no sense of direction and no clue as to when impeding doom would splatter you into liquid on the hard floor miles below, you somehow managed to land on the one landing zone that could keep your life intact! Smack dab in the middle of the table was a vegetable platter the women had ordered and you had landed safely straight into a ocean of humus. Your body sunk halfway into the viscous substance from the armpits up... another lucky break. If you had landed on your head you`d probably be suffocating in something this difficult to move in.

Though you were thankful for the one in a million rescue, you weren't unaware of the danger that literally loomed over you in the form of four hungry, oblivious women! One of them, a woman in a white cropped tank top and blue denim baseball cap, was the first to bring down the wrath of god in the form of a baby carrot the size of a sequoia tree down upon you!
13511122.title: Take a dip in the Dip

choices: The woman spots you and drops the carrot stick
Unkowingly, the woman bites into the carrot
The blonde saw where you landed, and slaps the carrot away from her friend
The woman pauses as waitstaff bring over the main course
The woman's phone rings
135111221.content:
Okay, you over-estimated the size of that carrot stick, but as it barrels toward your trapped, three-quarter inch tall self, you can be forgiven for magnifying dangers you face!

The woman whose terrifying hand holds that object must not have been paying attention; she can't have seen you get smacked into the dip, and must have looked up just now, else she'd see your dark form in this creamy sludge for sure. Instead, she ploughs on, and you take a blow to the midriff as she effortlessly drags the carrot through a surface that has trapped you utterly. Out of instinct you grab hold of your orange saviour, and feel elation as your legs are torn free of the goo, the coated snack stick ripped upward to the heavens.

You watch drops of this powerful, concrete-strength humus fall into the increasing distance to the table below, before turning to see the growing face of this hungry woman, a gargantuan tongue briefly licking her lips clean in anticipation of the new morsel. A tiny morsel to which you are stuck, soon to be devoured by an oblivious giant!

Will she look down and spot you, tossing you aside in fear? Would that be better or worse than being drawn into a hungry, gnashing maw of certain death? Why, oh why did you think that climbing down that rope was ever a good idea?
135111221.title: King-Size Carrot

choices: Hide behind a molar
Slip down between the gums
Grab onto the uvula
1351112212.content:
It was too late for reflection on how you ended up here. Learning from mistakes would come later, but first, you needed to keep your composure and figure out what to do once you were inside this woman's mouth, because at this point it was inevitable. The thick, gooey substance that was the dip, kept you trapped on the carrots surface, slowing your movements down to much to able to break completely free in time. Therefore, you would need to be ready, for only teeth mashing this carrot apart would do the trick. Obviously, that was incredibly risky. You would need to be very lucky and hope you wouldn't end up directly beneath a tooth once the chewing began. The combination of breaking apart the carrot, and the humidity of her breath, would no doubt liquefy the dip enough for you to be free, then you would have to improvise from there to avoid being swallowed.

The woman had just lifted you past your breasts, and you watched as the face that towered above you, grew closer and closer until she took up your entire field of vision, bringing you so close to her opening mouth, that you could already feel the heat from inside washing over you. Doing your best to calm yourself, you desperately scan the inside of the woman's massive maw, for possible areas to make a mad dash towards one you were (hopefully) free! You make a mental list of possible choices,

First, you took interest in the space behind her molars in her bottom row of teeth. It was uncomfortably close to the back of her throat, but if you could manage to hold on to the molar, you would at least be safe from getting crushed.

Then, there was the possibility of wedging yourself between her gums and lip. You would be surrounded by slick surfaces that would be difficult to climb when you would need to get out, but again, it would keep you from being crushed under teeth and decrease your chance of being swallowed, as long as you don't cause an irritation and make her force you out with her tongue.

Lastly, the uvula. That would be the absolute last resort. It would be incredibly difficult to cling onto due to its slimy texture, you would be dangling above the long drop into her stomach, and not to mention you weren't tall enough to reach it on your own! You would need to leap from a piece of carrot or something to be able to reach it and latch yourself on!

Your plans weren't perfect, but they were the best you could come up with in such a short amount of time before you were deposited into this oblivious woman's body. You were so close that were now passing under her nose, a mere centimeter away from entering her mouth! From this distance, you could now truly experience just how high the temperature was in there, as a powerful wave of heat blasted over your body, blowing your hair back and warming your skin like you had just spent an hour on a beach in summer. You looked along the front of the carrot as a shadow began to crawl up its surface towards you, as you were brought further into her mouth, passing her lips and hovering above her large pink tongue. You were now inside and could already notice the humidity doing the trick on weakening the dips hold on you! You broke your arms free of its hold and turned to look behind you, just in time to watch her top row of teeth descend down onto the carrot and snap it in half with a deafening *CRUNCH*, closing her mouth and blackening out your vision in darkness. Quickly, taking advantage of the fact you haven't been freed of the dip yet, you plunge your hand into dip and dig around at your waist until you were able to grab onto your headlamp in one of your pouches. You secure it to your head and flick it on, watching with amazement as its beam of light illuminates the inside of the cavernous mouth, glimmering in saliva coated walls.

It was like riding a very large kayak in raging rapids, as the young woman's tongue pushed the carrot all around into teeth that continually broke it apart into smaller pieces. Eventually, your area of the carrot was demolished in all this carnage as well, releasing you from the dip and dropping you right onto the center of the squishy, bumpy tongue! You struggled to keep yourself in place as bits of carrot rushed past you and the tongue squirmed underneath your feet! You had to make your move towards a safer area of the mouth now and wait out this chaos! But which one was closest?
1351112212.title: Into the mouth of Danielle

choices: Slide down the woman's arm
Jump onto her chest
The waiter bumps her arm, sending you off the carrot
1351112214.content:
The woman doesn't even look as she motions you towards her waiting mouth. All her attention was focused on enjoying the company of her friends as they talked away, completely oblivious to what was happening right under their noses. You, an ant sized, hysterical man stuck on a carrot, looking death straight in the mouth. This was seriously how it was all going to end? All the adventures that could have been, washed away by crushing teeth and stomach acids, and no one would be the wiser as to what became of you? It was a downright pathetic ending to your story, reduced to nothing but fecal matter in this woman's next trip to the bathroom.

There was nothing you believed could be done. You stared into the woman's open mouth right in front of you, focusing far ahead at the back of her throat, watching as the muscles bulged in anticipation of the impending snack. Having decided you had seen enough, you curled yourself up into the sweet flavored sludge like it was a horrible blanket and shut your eyes as you waited and hoped for a quick end as something for her teeth to decimate into a bloody mess.

"Order up ladies!"

A voice called out above their conversation, drawing their attention to the waiter approaching with a tray full of enticing, healthy meals. The girls all stopped what they were doing to voice their satisfaction with how quick and delicious their food appeared, meaning that the woman who was so close to popping a tiny man riding a carrot into her mouth, instead held it still as she received her meal. You had felt the interruption in movement and understood what was happening enough to know that this was a miraculous opportunity for salvation that came at precisely the right moment! It didn't matter to you if there was a God or not, you silently praised and thanked the lord as you frantically scooped globs of dip off of you and freed yourself from it. Now you found yourself balancing precariously on the slippery surface of this cylindrical vegetable, unsure of what your next move should be. The woman was still busy chatting with her friends at the friendly young server, but you also noticed that two of them already had their meals in front and he was just about to lay this woman's plate down in front of her! Time was running out!

There wasn't a lot you could do to get off this carrot safely, but looking behind you, you saw the woman's thumb and forefinger gripping onto the end of the baby carrot. Beyond that, you peered over the side of the carrot and followed her arm down to her bent elbow resting on the table miles below you. Aside from the white fitbit she wore on her wrist, her exposed skin should mean you could just slide all the way down easily enough. If you run up to those fingers, then make your way down her arm, you would be able to get on the table and finally escape this madness!

On the opposite end, you were within jumping distance to this woman's chest area. Her low cut tank top meant you may be able to land directly on her breasts like cushions, or even if you ended up landing around her collarbone, you could try and grab onto her silver necklace!

At this point, the waiter was setting her plate onto the table! Time was officially out! Time to make a decision!
1351112214.title: A moment is all that's needed

choices: Onto the train!
Stick with the plan to stay at the train stop
Hover a while, see if any interesting people have arrived
1352.content:
At the train stop, you'd be staying in the same place yet at the same time be exposed to a wide variety of different people coming and going. Protection from the elements is thrown in for free, in the shape of the awning large enough to shelter even the gigantic regular-size commuters! Destination decided!

You set the drone in pursuit of the woman, but as it zips into the darkened underground you pause for a moment - your mode of transportation may well give you away! You'll have to bail out beforehand lest some stranger follow the drone and find you!

Why didn't you think about this earlier? Still, plenty of time to compensate for a lack of fore-thought! And luckily enough, the buzzing of your drone is drowned out by a train pulling into the station at that moment, its cacophony all the more monstrous for someone of your three-inch height.

As you ponder a suitable landing spot while everyone is concentrating on boarding, another thought occurs to you: you could always live inside the train carriage itself! The same opportunities for food and shelter would be present, and the risk of being attacked in the night by vermin would be cut astronomically! You'll have to decide quick, as there's not much time for you to fly inside before those doors close...
1352.title: Last Stop

choices: An average family (mother, father, brother, sister) setting out towels
A young boy and girl starting a sand castle
Naked (gasp!) sunbathers, trying to get a tan
Stampeding teenagers, running over you to get to the water
No one.  The people you heard were far away.
14.content:
It's the perfect day at the beach. The tide's out, the sun is shining, and the cool breeze feels great in your face. As you step off the bus with the handful of vacationers who rode with you, you realize that this will be the last time in a while that you can feel these things at full size.

You step onto the sand. It's a bit hot, but it's still early enough to walk on. You set your beach bag down, and start digging into it. While most of the people here packed for a nice day at the beach, you packed for desert survival. First things first, you pulled out what you called "The Contingency Plan." It looked like a simple black box, but it was actually one of the most powerful size altering devices ever made. Of course, when it's also the first size altering device ever made, that's an easy claim to make. You set a timer on it for fifteen minutes. That's how long until it shrinks you. Then, you set another timer for 6:00 tomorrow morning. That way, if day one convinces you that this plan is complete garbage, you'll be able to escape.

You bury the box under some sand so no one'll find it. Standing up, you close the bag and walk over to a nice, deserted spot in the middle of the beach. It's far enough from the ocean that high tide won't touch it, and it's in the middle of sharp shells and rocks so no one will step on you. You settle down into the spot and wait.

And wait some more. Maybe fifteen minutes was too long. You decide to take inventory of what you have. Five bottles of sunscreen, to help prevent sunburns while your skin is still pale and unused to the sun; a canteen to carry water; flint and steel; cookwear designed for camping; a sun hat; and of course a sword. You've taken courses on how to wield it, so finding food and fighting predators shouldn't be too difficult.

You've killed some serious time now. Only a minute left.

30 seconds.

15.

10.

5. 4. 3. 2.

"That looks like a good place to set up. Come on!"

1! Wait, what was that?

Your body goes numb as it is being reformed. Slowly, your senses come back online.

Smell hasn't changed. Neither has touch or taste. However, as sound comes back online, you hear voices. Loud voices from not too far away. It's too hard to tell who's making them, since these ears might as well be new. You'll need to see who is ruining your plan, but testing showed that vision always took the longest to come back online, since the eyes needed a lot of work to use light of a different wavelength. As the blurring clears, you see...
14.title: Prepared for the beach

choices: approach them
flee from them
someone else walks between you
141.content: You see a mother and father closing the trunk of their SUV holding white towels with blue polka dots on them, while a boy and girl run towards the water. You assume they're together. Do you go to this family?
141.title: An average family (mother, father, brother, sis...

choices: Head for the purse.
Go for the beach bag.
March further up, in case there's something beyond the giants
1411.content:
"This is perfect", you think aloud.

Getting supplies is going to be the most important thing to you for right now and then you can try to set up camp later. While the boy and the girl are running to the water, you watch the mother and father begin to lay down on their towels with beach bags posted in between them. You figure that there has to be food and water in there so you start your trek past home sized shells.

The couple seem to be miles away and the sand is much harder to walk on at this size. It is like walking on many pebbles but they are all uneven and shifty under your footsteps. The smell of the ocean water is very strong at your tiny size and the overwhelming sun is starting to test your will. It takes almost half an hour but soon you make it to the giants on their towels.

It is hot outside but the sight makes you quiver. The giant couple's feet towered up in the sky like city buildings. Wrinkles that seemed deep enough for you to use as handholds lined up the perfect soles speckled with grains of sand. Their long toes were easily large enough to crush cars. The guy's feet were noticeable larger than the woman's but she could easily set her little toe on top of your one fourth of an inch tall body and make you into paste without even noticing. You couldn't even see their faces from this point of view but you could make out the beach bag looming above if you go past the titanic feet in front of you.

You thought to yourself before you were snapped out of it by the prodding from one of the woman’s giant digits.

“You know... If you agree to it, I’m thinking that this one here might be the best option for you”. She said with a giggle as she scrolled through many pictures of what looked to be the biggest, and most thought out terrarium yet. It was equipped with full forests, and plains... Rivers and lakes dotted the landscape, along with full mountain ranges even! You were in awe from the sheer beauty of it all. Right when you were about to agree to her suggestion, some concerns stopped you which you made sure to address.

“You know... this looks great, and all... but what would I do for things like food...? Shelter...? You know things like that...” You sheepishly said aloud. The only reason the woman could hear you being that her ear was now pressed against your spot on the towel. You were caught off guard by her sudden booming laughter which threatened to nearly blow you away, and get lost in the sand. However, you just barely managed to hold onto the thick fibers of the towel.

She continued laughing, not even realizing that she literally almost blew you away. “Oh... Oh wow... And you call yourself a ‘survival expert’!“. She said as the laughs eventually turned to giggles, and died down. “Ahh... Don’t worry... I thought you said that you wanted a challenge, you know? To survive... Pretty much all of the plant life you see in there is edible. As for shelter... I guess you’ll just have to make your own... My little survivalist...”. She said with a grin as her finger slowly started to block out the sun, threatening to crush you as she began to rub your head very lightly. “However... I’m not a cruel owner... If you’re in desperate need of something like food, I’ll be more than happy to step in, and give you some rations...”. She said trying to look regal as she stretched her neck out a bit more. “After all... I’d do anything for my little pet...”. She said as she bumped your head with her colossal finger once more.

“So what do you say little one?“. She said picking you up, and bringing you in front of her gorgeous smiling face. You felt her minty warm breath wash over you as she spoke once more. “If you agree, then you get to survive within the safe boundaries of my home... And I get a new cute little pet! Besides... It should be perfect for you given that you’re barely a 1/4 of an inch tall!”. She said absolutely beaming with excitement.
14312112.title: No way your just to much fun. Your coming home ...

choices: One of the many dense forests.
The plains, and or moorland obviously.
MOUNTAIN MAN!
143121121.content:
"Really...? You mean it...?!". The woman said suddenly bringing you up against her lips, and smooshing you against the colossal things over, and over. She pulled her hands away only to realize that she must've gotten a bit too rough with you since you were no longer on her finger. She carefully swiped her finger along her bottom lip, squishing and smearing you a bit more into it during the process before pulling her huge digit away to see you now stuck back onto her finger... covered in a mixture of lipstick, and saliva.

"Oops...". She said with a giggle before taking part of the towel, and gently wiping you down. "Sorry about that little guy... You're just so teeny tiny... I'll have to be a lot more careful with you then I thought...". She said before placing you on her collar bone as she got up from the towel, and started to gather her things. You couldn't help, but notice from earlier that she was with who looked to be her husband, and daughter. Although, if that was that case... Was she just going to leave them here, and take you back to the house? You tried waving your arms around, and yelling for her in an attempt to signal her when she finally took notice and gently placed you in her ear.

"What's the deal Ms.???". You ask confused. "Isn't that your husband, and daughter that we just left back there? Shouldn't they know about me if I'm going to be living with you guys from now on??? And wait... If we leave, how are they going to get back to the house??". You said spouting off question after question since your were genuinely a bit confused by her actions. The woman let out a slight laugh before speaking up once again. "Oh! I'm sorry... I guess I owe you an explanation since well... How else were you supposed to know if I didn't tell you right...?". She laughed once more, before making a "duh..." sound and chiming in once more.

"The people you saw me with was my ex Ron, and our daughter Allison... Since we're separated, we don't live together anymore. However... Allison usually stays with me every other week". She looked as if she was pondering something for a moment, before speaking up once more. "I guess I could tell Allison about you if you want... I'm not quite sure how she'd react though... Buuuuttt... The terrarium that I'll be keeping you in will be setup in my room, and Allison really doesn't have a reason to go in there... So for that reason, I could just keep you as my little itty bitty secret!". She said cutely as she reached up to her ear, and gave you another colossal head pat.

"Annnyyywaaayyy... It's best not to worry about that right now, since she won't even be back for another week...". She said with a giggle as she finished loading everything into the car, before putting on some clothes over her bikini, and getting in, before closing the door. "Now... Where to put you...". She said biting her lip as she looked around the car, and her purse trying to find anything that she could store you in for the ride home. "Aha! Gotcha!". She exclaimed as she pulled what looked to be an empty Tic-tac container out of her purse. Before you even knew what was happening she gently plucked you out of her ear, and tilted her hand towards the opening in the container. You were like a leaf in the wind as you tumbled down her palm, and gently descended down into the bottom of the huge container. Being barely a 1/4 of an inch tall really had it's perks when it came to things like this. If you were any bigger, the fall wouldn't have been nearly as graceful.

You heard her giggle to herself as you got up to your feet, and patted yourself down. Watching your descent into the container must've been pretty comedic for her. "Oh! By the way, I guess I should've mentioned this before... My name's Serena...". She said with a smile as her colossal eye loomed a bit closer, examining you a bit more from outside the container. You nervously gulped down the lump in your throat as you watched her examine you. Seeing that you were going to speak up, she pressed her ear against the opening in the container so that she could hear you. "It's nice to meet you Serena, I'm 'Your Name'". You said with a small chuckle. " 'Your Name'... huh? I don't think that it fits you very well... we might just have to change that...". She said before busting out laughing. "I'm just messing with you... mostly...". She said with a grin before setting the container back down into the dark depths of her purse, and starting on the drive back home. You tried to stay awake, but the rhythmic humming from the car, and the darkness from inside the purse was more than enough to make you pass out.

When you awoke, you felt a warm breeze wash over you. You stood up in what felt like long reeds of grass...? The light from above was a bit to bright for you to see anything until you rubbed your eyes a bit more, and let out a yawn. However, when your eyes finally adjusted, you couldn't believe what you were seeing... You looked to be in what appeared to be a large field, with a river running through it... And at full size none the less. You looked around and were amazed to see huge forests in the distance filled with pines, and birch trees. As well as sloping hills way out in the distance, which eventually led out to what looked to be a very distant mountain ranges. The landscape before you went on for so long that you couldn't even make out where it ended. For a minute you began to question if you had died in your sleep and moved onto the next life until you heard, and felt a rhythmic booming getting ever closer and louder. You weren't quite sure where it was coming from until you saw the sun in the sky begin to get blocked out by something colossal. Before you knew it, the artificial cloud layer in the sky had parted revealing the monolithic face of Serena peering down at you. You were so in awe of your now Goddess-like owner that you were frozen in pure shock of the situation.

Before too long, you were snapped out of it by her booming voice echoing throughout the lands around you. "Aww... Finally awake now, are we sleepy head?". She said with a booming giggle following after. "You were just so adorable sleeping that I didn't want to wake you, I figured that I should place you in your new home. Well... new 'world' for someone your size...". She continued on with a warm smile on her face. "Well I hope you like it...". She said looking a slight bit nervous about how it might look for someone of your scale. "I design all of my terrariums to be as life like as possible, and this one... well it's definitely no exception...". She let out a slight giggle. You wanted to speak up, and ask her more questions about your new world, but before you could she spoke up once more. "I'm gonna go shower, and get cleaned up... And you should probably start on some kind of shelter little guy... I hear it gets pretty cold at night...". She said with a grin before her face ascended back up into the heavens, until the clouds finally closed back around it... Letting the sun shine back onto the lands, and leaving you alone in your new world.

With no time to waste, you figured that she's right. Without some kind of shelter you weren't going to last long in the elements. The only question now was where to settle down...?
143121121.title: “That sounds amazing! When can we leave?!”

choices: The next day you decide to try your luck with foraging.
Later on, you awake to see the side of your shelter engulfed in flames.
You awake in the night to strange noises coming from outside your shelter.
1431211211.content:
As you continued to think about it for a while longer, you realized that this was a race against the clock... and whatever you chose to do; you had to do it soon. Suddenly realizing that you'd be an idiot for choosing anything else besides the forest, you started on the short walk towards it.

The temperature began to cool down a bit quicker than you expected it to, especially since you had no idea what season this world was going into it. However, after a bit of time passed you had realized that it was in fact early Winter as it started to get pretty cold out. With no time to waste you started to gather up small twigs, stones, and long reeds of grass. After a few hours, you had managed to craft some primitive tools as you started cutting down big low-hanging branches to form some sort of shelter. The environment in the forest was definitely much more bearable than the grassy plains. It was easily a good 15 degrees warmer here within the natural insulation of the vegetation rather than bearing witness to the chill winds out on the plains.

You began to wonder how low Serena had set the heat lamp, since it was Winter in the terrarium... maybe she was just trying to make a realistic world for you...? After stopping for water a few times from the nearby stream, with the cold water stinging your throat... you had managed to build a sort of small log cabin-like hut. Grabbing moss, and leaves off of the ground and nearby trees to act as insulation. After all, you had to keep the heat in however you could if you wanted to even live through the first night. You'd gone around the thing three more times just to make sure that there were no extremely visible gaps, before slumping down against the outside wall of the hut. "Phew... I don't think that I've worked that hard in years..." You said catching your breath.

When you initially signed your life over to her, and became her pet; you knew that things would still be difficult. After all you didn't expect life to at this size to be an easy task. What you signed up for was a challenging existence filled with survival, and this was exactly that! "Well... at least she'll provide me with supplies if I start to run into trouble..." You said with a sigh of relief as you continued to sit there. Exhausted from a long day's work. As the sun started to set, you realized that you should probably start on a fire. With that, you used the last bit of your energy for today to gather kindling around the camp and produce a small, but still effective fire. You started to rub your hands next to the flames, knowing that you'd have to find food tomorrow or things could get bad.

As Serena had shut the water to the shower off, she couldn't help but wonder how you were managing for your first time in a terrarium. As she continued to dry off, she pondered if she was being a bit too hard on you by making your first season there Winter. But as she walked out of the bathroom, and sat down on the edge of her bed... she could just barely make out a tiny pin-prick of light coming from one of the lesser forests. Suddenly her concerns for you well being had pretty much vanished. "Good for you little one..."She said aloud to herself. "Just you wait until Winter really sets in..." She said with a mischievous laugh as she knew that soon, things were bound to get a lot more challenging for you.

The chill wind of night washed over you rattling your bones a bit too much for your liking. Even with the fire, it was still way too cold without your clothing, not to mention what it'd be like when snow starts to fall. Before turning in, you made sure that the fire was stocked full of wood, and kindling before opening the curtain like flap to your shelter, where you began to bundle up under the heavy amounts of dry grasses and moss that you gathered up earlier in the day. As you began to fall asleep, you could've sworn that you heard what sounded like a distant booming laugh. However... you paid it no mind as the cold was making you sleepy, and you just couldn't force yourself to stay awake any longer...
1431211211.title: One of the many dense forests.

choices: Nothing to do but wait...
Find a way to escape.
Fate intervenes...
143121122.content:
“I’m sorry... I’d rather just continue wandering the beach.” You try to not gaze your nervous eyes into her massive brown one, observing your response, an impossible task.

You are jolted as the light brown massive pillars that secure you tight move a bit away from her eye. You see the entirety of her face, it is not encouraging. In place of compassion or understanding there is a cold face, with just a hint of bemusement. That bemusement grows as the woman shuddering words wash warmly over you, but cut icily to your core.

“Asking was really more a courtesy, my little pet. I’m not giving up a creature as valuable as you so you can live out some crazy survival thing. You'd probably just end up inside a gull by tomorrow anyway. *GIGGLE* You squirm now, trying to find away out of the mad woman’s grip, but you make no noticeable progress.

The woman’s gaze shufts from you to her left. You follow it. Her unoccupied hand has plunged into her handbag, feeling around for something. Her voice returns. “Trust me little guy, this is better for you and me. You can live out your dream in a safer, controlled environment. Heck, conduct whatever studies you want. More importantly I can study you and your ability to survive and adapt in diverse environments with differing flora snd fauna, just like my other pets. Think of how interesting that will be for us both!” You try to protest but her attention is half on her fantasy and half on the bag.

You are lost in shock, this woman plans to keep you in a terrarium like just one of her creatures she studies! What the hell?! This wasn’t going to plan at all. What’s worse is she seems to perversely think its in your best interests, regardless of your opinion on the matter.

“Ah, here we are.” Her hand retracts holding a “small” Bag of green Tic Tacs, each about your size, but wider, yet she holds them and their container with infinite ease. Dumping dozens of you sized boulder like Tic Tacs into her hand, she tosses them far and wide, hoping the seagulls take interest in cleaning up her little mess. She raises the bottle underneath and realization hits too late, the powerful fingers release and you fall into a decent sized hole, smacking against the clear glass on the side before sliding down asteep angle to the bottom.

You hit with an “uff”. The smell of the Tic Tacs is all around you. You scramble to your feet and look up the narrow container, the swirls of the woman's two fingers holding the container do not fully conceal the massive brown eyes staring at you with unabashed glee over her find. You pound you scream but the woman is only further amused before lightly shaking your prison, or charitably bug box. With one last happy stare and a murmur, clear to your micro ears. “But which to put him in first.” Without further acknowledgement the woman lowers the box into the purse, plunging you into semi-darkness, surrounded by towering everyday items. The drop jostles you into the plastic walls some, as does the subsequent Great shake as the bag is hoisted to her shoulder. But its not those bumps and bruises that bring you to the verge of tears...
143121122.title: “I’m sorry... I’d rather just continue wa...

choices: She gets ready to put you into a terrarium.
You begin to protest!
One of her family members walks in to interrupt...
1431211221.content:
You can't believe that this woman had just put you inside of a Tic-Tac container and now intends to keep you as a pet. Your first thought is you have to find a way to escape, but that leads you to no where as you realize that your stuck in this Tic-tac container that is inside this woman's purse in till she lets you out. So, all you can do is nothing but sit and wait. You sit in the dark for hours as you have no other choices of what to do.

During this time, the woman just lays against her towel while she enjoyed the sun. She is given the occasional conversation from her husband but for the most part they both just relax in the sun. Her daughter seemed to have been having a blast playing in the water. And eventually her husband finally came back and told his wife that they should all get dressed and head back home. It was a very relaxing day for all of them except you.

They all put there clothes on and left the beach. You finally got to feel movement as you being stuck inside a Tic-Tac container tumble around the inside of it, as the Tic-Tac container tumbles around the inside of the purse as the woman swings her purse onto her shoulder as she walks with her family towards there car.

You can can only hear noises of the adults speaking to one another, but can not see anything. As you then hear different sounds of car doors and then a loud engine. You can then feel the purse being placed onto the floor of the car.

The drive is about 30 to 40 minutes long and your left with really nothing to do the entire time. But finally the family arrives at there home. They unload everything from the car and go inside. You can hear the TV on in the background with there laughing and shouts of play at certain points.

But you then eventually hear the woman who captured you say that she needed to finish some work up in her office. And with taking the purse that you are in side of. She strolls into her office and closes the door.

You still have no idea what to do. The wait is the worst part, you can't do anything except sit there and wait. But you can finally see as light begins to pour into the gigantic purse as the woman's hand reaches in and takes out the Tic-Tac container that you are inside of.

You see her eyes grow as wide as saucers as she drops the purse and continues to look at you. She holds that Tic-Tac container that has you inside of it up to her gigantic brown eyes. She shakes the container a little bit before giggling as she opens it and then shakes you out onto the palm of her gigantic hand.

You are a bit dizzy as you hear her giggle. You stabilize yourself a bit and get a chance to look around at the room you are in. You see a wall of shelfs filled with terrariums that look very realistic on the inside. And as you stare at them you see insects swarming around the inside of the terrariums.

You turn your attention quickly back to the woman though as you hear her say "...Well my little pet survivalist, are you excited to get into your terrarium?...". You don't really know how you want to respond to that though. But then again she wasn't really waiting for you to respond as she giggles and begins walking over to her desk. She sits down in her chair and then she stares down at you in her palm. She begins examining you carefully.

(What happens next?...)
1431211221.title: Nothing to do but wait...

choices: Do as demanded, toss aside all your clothes and possessions
Fold your arms, and refuse to play along
Remove your clothes, but keep your tools
Run away from the woman, aim to hide and survive on your own terms
Attack her with your sword, showing courage and demanding recognition as human
14312112211.content:
The woman frowns down at you, and it's like the whole sky has become saddened. So set upon the expression of this god-like being that you don't notice her free hand moving in from the side, squeezing tight to grab you in the prongs of a set of tweezers.

Cold metal crushes your fragile body as it wrenches you up into the air. You kick and flail, but what insect could ever overpower a human? Your feet are smacked against hard glass before you are relased, your battered body collapsing in a heap.

"Strip."

The word is breathed out matter-of-factly, and you can do nothing but stare up at the woman, who still hasn't told you her name. She wants you to divest yourself of your clothes, yet she won't identify herself? It's like she's seeing you as a true insect, not a human being with thoughts and feelings..!

"Come on, no need to be shy. You saw me in all my glory, or have you already forgotten nearly being squashed beneath my nipple? I'd probably damage you a lot more if you forced me to try and take those clothes off you myself."

She can't hear any words you speak, no matter how much you shout, so you can only stand and shrug.

"Look, I need to take some measurement before I put you into your habitat, to have base levels to run changes against. And, you know, if you truly want to prove that you can survive, you'll have to do so starting from scratch, not cheating and bringing any tools in with you."

Oh, so it is purely scientific, she doesn't want to sneak a peek at your microscopic junk. A relief in some ways, but it further dehumanises you, reducing you to nothing but an experiment. You think over your inventory of items - five bottles of sunscreen; an empty canteen; flint and steel; cookwear; a sun hat; a sword. Given that you won't be on a beach, they won't be too helpful anyway, but how confident are you of surviving naked at three-eighths of an inch tall?
14312112211.title: As God Intended

choices: A large glass terrarium spanning the length of the wall.
A small terrarium.
Her backyard, which is a greenhouse.
14312112212.content:
This woman had kidnapped you, ruined your survivalist plans, kept you locked in a Tic Tac container for hours as she enjoyed herself, bumped you around carelessly in her purse as she travelled causing bruises, even at one point a massive lipstick container had slammed into your glass prison, causing a massive sound that reverberated through your tiny skull, more bruises, oh and the terror of being crushed by a previously mundane now the size of a narrow 6 story building.

All of this to now leave you stranded even longer, hungry, bruised, tired, pride and hope shattered, as she enjoyed a casual night with the family. She was a sociopath, with no regard for you as a human being, a fellow sentient creature at least. Now over the cup of her hand you see the myriad of terrariums on shelves, large and small, some with tubes, others the classic glass tanks, various creatures surely inhabited them but at this distance it was difficult to make out any specific creature. Further, there were likely dozens of others at hip height and lower you could not see from your limited perspective in the palm of this woman's hand.

With her other hand the woman taps on her chin, deep in thought, as her eyes wander the room. "Hmmm..." rumbles through the air, and also through your feet and up into the rest of your body. A surprisingly pleasurable sensation.

Frustration grows at her, for past deeds and for completely ignoring you as she decides your new home. Finally, it boils over. "Hey!" "HEY!!! This isn't right! I'm a scientist and a human being and I demand to be released right this instant!" At first she pays you no mind, so you drop to your knees and begin pounding on her skin, fists nearly fitting between the wrinkles, and obscenities at the top of your lungs. After a few moments of this, you get the distinct impression you are being watched. Turning your head up, you see that you have the woman's full, focused attention. She stares down her nose at you, seemingly annoyed, but her massive lips betray a twinge of amusement. "Yes little one?"

Now that you have her attention, you suddenly feel weak kneed and struggle for words. The bemused smile fades after a moment, and before you can speak your frustration, the woman does your talking for you. "Ah, eager to begin the experiment I bet? I suppose that makes sense, you did make such a sacrifice for such a unique experience." You have to seize this moment of attention, however fickle. "Look, ma'am. Please take me back to the beach. This isn't what I wanted, and honestly this whole shrinking adventure thing was probably a terrible idea. This is dangerous and I don't wanna be some pet or lab rat! I need to restore my size!" She stares for a moment, evidently hearing some if not all of your pleas. Her face contorts contemplatively. "But this IS what you wanted, and its what I want too, for now at least." Her gaze turns to something beyond your vision, and you realize further attempts at communication, at least at this time, are pointless.

Without warning you are shaken from your knees to your side as the woman rises from her chair. Seems she has decided for you where you will begin the next phase of your rapidly spiraling adventure.
14312112212.title: You begin to protest!

choices: Nighttime, Find Shelter or Die.
Water Now, Whatever the Risks
One week later...
143121122121.content:
You manage to rise long enough from her cupped hand to see where she is headed, a large, even to a regular sized person, glass terrarium, nearly the length of the wall it is almost up against, your quick estimates are that regular sized it is about 20 or so feet long with a width of 3 to 4 feet, leaving only a narrow lane just big enough for a normal sized person to sidestep along. It rests on a table, just below hip height for the woman. Above the long, clear box is a large lamp, which appears to be on some sort of moving wall mount. Judging by its color and intensity, it is some sort of heating lamp, and its movement seems to be an attempt to imitate the movement of the sun. At present it appears to be near the far side of the table. The wall behind the terrarium appears to be coated in a large picture resembling an ocean. On the far left side in the corner there is a small pond, that connects to some sort of aquarium under the table that nearly matches the size of the one above, teeming with fish life. To the right is followed by an area of sand, dirt, and pebbles that leads a short distance up a slight hill before entering a thick foliage of wide leafed plants that appear to be those found on tropical islands in the Pacific. Another small clearing is at the opposite wall, but you can see little else as the woman approaches too rapidly.

Standing above what appears to be your new home, or prison, the woman scans the inside for a moment. Seemingly contented, she opens one of the large windows at the top, then her hand containing you descends rapidly to the floor of the terrarium. The impact through her hand once again tosses you to your stomach, and wasting no time for your own initiative or well-being the woman tilts her hand, rolling you roughly off her palm and into the sand below. Without so much as a 'sorry', the giant hand pulls up and away at rapid speed, belying your feeble attempt to reach out to it. Your only way in and out of this cage has just left you.

You sputter out some sand particles the size of gumdrops, and pull yourself onto your butt. You glance up at the appendage, now gripping the inside of edge of the window. A part of your mind wants to beg the thing for salvation, until your rational side kicks in. That is not a creature, but an appendage of the massive being stooped over the desk, watching you from just beyond the glass. It won't help if she doesn't decide to, and she's clearly decided on your fate.

With that annoying smirk and trademark giggle, the woman speaks up, sound distorted by the glass and echoing down instead from the hole above. "Trust me, this is a much better way to test your survival skills and study your environment." A pleased expression, from the certitude that she's doing the right thing, fills her visage. "Now, its not 100% safe in there, not for a little thing like you, but safer than some beach, and this is an amazing opportunity to study human survival skills and mental effects. I can't pass up something so interesting! So try to stay alive, alright? I'll need to work you into my research schedule, but overseeing your developments are my BIGGEST priority *giggle*" The condescension is palpable. You are nothing more than a subject in a research project for this person, whose name you still don't even know. This control freak, who has locked up hundreds, if not thousands of creatures smaller and bigger than you for her curious studies, or worse, amusement.

With a little wave she rises to her full height. Her tight shorts covered hips and upper thighs now dominate your view. You stare straight ahead at this further reinforcement of your pathetic stature to your new "overseer". But you are lost in shock, and barely notice the loud click of the glass locking above, nor focus on the immense being beyond the glass's turn, footsteps thundering away as her hips swayed, carrying her immense mass swiftly away from your new home, and amplifying her enormity. Returning to her chair, hundreds of feet away, she sits down and begins filling out some paperwork on a notepad, while occasionally typing things into her desktop computer, seemingly not giving the slightest attention to the terrarium just a few steps away where the first known shrunken person resides.

You see all this, but you surprisingly don't care. She is now beyond the glass, and not your concern right now. Slowly, unsteadily, you rise to your feet and turn your attention towards the jungle beyond. You steel your nerves, the only way to get out of this mess was to survive. Survival meant a chance, however slim, that you'd find a way out of this grim situation. Survival was what you had set out to do, and despite the terribly worse situation, its what was still priority number one. Eyeing the jungle, full of unknown life, dangers, and tools, your courage falters for a moment. The task before you is tremendous. But that was the challenge right? Time to step up, time to throw every physical and mental part of you at overcoming this challenge. Time to survive.

Hurriedly you rush to the water, diving your hands into the thick, viscous surface tension, you pull upwards with notable effort and come off cupping a droplet, perfectly remaining a sphere in your micro hands, you suck on it. You cough, drat, saltwater. You'd need to find water soon, shelter right after that, and then food. Then take on other tasks. In the distance about halfway to the "treeline" is a thin stick, probably splinter sized to a normal human, but to you its your spear, at least for now. You rush towards it, bounding between dog and even person sized pebbles further from the water. In the distance, beyond the glass, the woman goes about her routine, rising from her chair, moving from terrariums to cages to aquariums, observing her research subjects, making notes, providing food. You dully feel her steps and notice her distant somewhat blurry shape moving about out of the corner of your eye, but your attention is focused here and now, on world on the inside. Funny that you could be in such close proximity to another human being, her very existence so consequential to you, and be completely disinterested.
